GSP29antsdi_u:4079: sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ sā sāmānyalakṣaṇā pratyāsattiḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4080: sannikarṣaḥ/ vahnitvadhūmatvātmakasaṃnikarṣeṇa tadāśrayasakalavanhidhūmānāṃ pratyakṣe sati vanhitvāvacchinnanirūpitasāmānādhikaraṇyatvena rūpeṇa
GSP29antsdi_u:4082: pratyakṣitam/ ataḥ dhūmadarśanena parvatīyadhūmaniṣṭhaparvatīyavahnisāmānādhikaraṇyarūpavyāpteḥ smaraṇaṃ bhavitumarhatīti bhāvaḥ/ etena
GSP29antsdi_u:4083: 1. vyāpyaliṅgakatvaṃ ca vyāpyaṃ yalliṃṅgaṃ tadviṣayakajñānajanyatvam anumiterbhramatvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4084: vyāptijñānasya bhramatvāt bhavati/ vyāpte rāsabhasādhāraṇye ca
GSP29antsdi_u:4085: vyāptijñānasya rāsabhadharmikasya pramātvāt tajjanyavahnyanumiterapi pramātvameva syāt na tu bhramatvamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4086: vahnitvadhūmatvarūpasāmānyalakṣaṇayā sakalavahnidhūmānāmupasthitāvapi vahnisāmānādadhikaraṇyarūpāyāḥ vyāpteḥ pratyekaviśrāntatayā pūrvaṃ mahānase mahānasīyadhūniṣṭhasāmānādhikaraṇyasya gṛhītatve 'pi
GSP29antsdi_u:4090: tarkasaṅgrahaḥ parārthānumānanirūpaṇam yattu svayameva dhūmādagnimanumāya parapratipattyarthaṃ pañcāvayavavākyaṃ prayuṅkte
GSP29antsdi_u:4094: prakāśikā yadyapi parārthānumānaśabdasya parasya madhyasthasya arthaḥ prayojanaṃ sādhyānumitirūpaṃ yasmāt iti vyutpattyā
GSP29antsdi_u:4096: ityādyagrimamūlaṃ sādhu saṅgacchate, tathāpi parārthānumānaprayojake pañcāvayavavākye parārthānumānaśabdasya aupacārikaḥ prayoga iti manasi kṛtvā mūlamavatārayati - parārthānumānamāheti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4097: bālapriyā parasya madhyasthasyeti/ yadyapi paraśabdaḥ anyaparaḥ, tathā cānyasamavetānumitikaraṇamityeva svarasataḥ parārthānumānaśabdārthaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4098: tathāpi nyāyarūpasya parārthānumānasya vādādikathāyāmeva prāyaśa upayogāt tatra paraśabdasya anyaprativādiparatve tasya bādhajñānasattvena bādyuktanyāyāt aprāmāṇyaśaṅkārahitā anumitirna jāyate, madhyasthasya tu pakṣadvaye 'pyāgraharahitasya anumitirbhavitumarhatītyāśayenaivaṃ vyākhyānaṃ kṛtam/
GSP29antsdi_u:4099: parārthānumānaprayojaka iti/ parārthānumānasya parasamavetānumitikaraṇasya liṅgaparāmarśasya, prayojake paramparayā kāraṇabhūte pañcāvayavakamahāvākyarūpe nyāye/ aupacārikaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4100: lākṣaṇikaḥ/ kāraṇe kāryopacāraḥ parārthānumānaśabda iti yāvat/
GSP29antsdi_u:4104: jāyate/ tarta ekavākyatāmāpannaiḥ pañcabhirvākyairekamahāvākyārthabodho jāyate/ tataḥ tatsahakṛtena manasā liṅgaparāmarśoṃ jāyate, tato 'numitiḥ ityevaṃ anumitijanakaliṅgaparāmarśajanakamahāvākyārthabodhajanakatayā parārthānumānaprayojakatvaṃ pañcāvayavavākyātmakanyāyasyeti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4110: liṅgaparāmarśaḥ/ kāryabhūtaliṅgaparāmarśavācakasya parārthānumānaśabdasya kārye liṅgiparāmarśe lakṣaṇayā prayoga
GSP29antsdi_u:4113: vahnimadabhinnaḥ' 'dhūmaniṣṭhaṃ jñāpakatvam' ityādyākārakāḥ pratijñādipratyekavākyārthaviṣayakāḥ pañca bodhāḥ jāyante/
GSP29antsdi_u:4114: dhūmajñānajñāpyetyādi/ upanayārthe hetvarthānvitapratijñārthodāharaṇārthayoruddeśyatāvacchedakatayā nigamanārthasya va vidheyatayā anvayāt udāharaṇaghaṭakayattatpadayordṛṣṭāntabodhakasya ca
GSP29antsdi_u:4117: labhyate/ tathā hi - dhūmāditi pañcamyantārthaḥ dhūmajñānanirūpitajñāpyatvam/ tasyāśrayatāsambandhena pratijñāghaṭakavahnipadārthe vahnāvanvayaḥ/ vahnimatpadārthasyābhedena parvatapadārthe tasyābhedasambandhena upanayaghaṭakedapadārthe parvate 'nvayaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4119: yatpadatatpadayathāmahānasapadānāṃ tātparyagrāhakatā/ dhūmavataḥ abhedena dhūmavyāpakavahnimatyanvayaḥ/ tasyacābhedena upanayasthedampadārthe 'nvayaḥ/ abādhitāsatpratipakṣitadhūmajñānajñāpya vahṛnimān nigamanārthaḥ, tasyābhedasambandhena upanayasthedampadārthe 'nvayaḥ/ upanayavākyarthastu vahnivyāpyadhūmavadabhinnaḥ parvataḥ, tathāśabdasya vahnivyāpyadhūmavadarthakatvāt idampadasya
GSP29antsdi_u:4121: tarkasaṅgrahaḥ nyāyāvayavanirūpaṇam yathā parvato vahnimān dhūmavattvāt, yo yo dhūmavān so 'gnimān yathā
GSP29antsdi_u:4122: mahānasaḥ, tathā ca ayam, tasmāt tathā iti/ anena vākyena pratipāditāt liṅgāt paro 'pyagniṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4126: yo yo dhūmavān sa so'gnimān yathā mahānasa ity udāharaṇam /
GSP29antsdi_u:4129: pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayanigamanāni pañcāvayavāḥ/ parvato vahnimān iti pratijñā/ dhūmavattvāt iti hetuḥ/ yo yo dhūmavān so 'gnimān yathā mahānasa ityudāharaṇam/ tathā cāyaṃ ityupanayaḥ/ tasmāt tatheti nigamanam/
GSP29antsdi_u:4132: vahnimāniti/ sādhyavattayā pakṣavacanam pratijñā/ pañcamyantaṃ liṅgapratipādakaṃ hetuḥ/ vyāptipratipādakam
GSP29antsdi_u:4133: vyāptiviśiṣṭaliṅgapratipādakaṃ vacanaṃ upanayaḥ/ hetusādhyavattayā pakṣapratipādakaṃ vacanaṃ nigamanam/ abādhitatvādikaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4135: prakāśikā pañcāvayavavākyaṃ ityanena pañca avayavā yasya vākyasya iti vyutpattyā pratijñādyavayavapañcakasamudāyatvaṃ nyāyalakṣaṇaṃ bodhyam/ anena pratipāditālliṅgāditi mūlasya
GSP29antsdi_u:4140: na pakṣatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭe, upanayācca pakṣatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭe hetutāvacchekaviśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyajñānam, na tu sādhyatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhijñānamiti tayornirāsaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4143: ityādau pratijñāyāṃ pañcamyantatvasya sattvāt ativyāptervāraṇāya liṅgapratipādakamiti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4145: prakṛtahetuvyāpakasādhyabodhakavākyamityarthaḥ/ kathamudāharaṇasya vyāpakatvabodhakateti cet - ittham, sādhyapadasya hetuvyāpakatvaviśiṣṭe sādhye nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā/ na ca dviruktayatpadasya
GSP29antsdi_u:4146: vaiyarthyamiti śaṅkyam, tādṛśatātparyagrāhakatayā sārthakyāt/ atha vā prathamayatpadārthe mahānase dvitīyayatpadārthe mahānasānyasmin
GSP29antsdi_u:4148: mahānasānyasmin sādhyasya ca śābdabodhe jāte uttarakāle vyāpakatābodho mānasaḥ/ tathā ca vyāptipratipattiparattvamudāharaṇasyākṣatamiti na kaściddoṣa iti
GSP29antsdi_u:4151: 'pakṣadharmatājñānārtham upanayaḥ' iti pāṭhe tu 'prayujyata' iti śeṣapūraṇena pradarśitārtha eva yathākathañcit saṅgamanīyaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4155: bālapriyā pratijñālakṣaṇaṃ pariṣkṛtamāha - sādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnetyādi/ parvato vanhimān ityākārakabodhasya pakṣatāvacchedakībhūtaparvatatvāvacchinnaviśeṣyakatvāt sādhyatāvacchedakībhūtavahnitvāvacchinnaprakārakatvācca tādṛśabodhajanake parvato vahnimāniti vākye lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4156: pakṣatāvacchedakāvacchinnaviśeṣyakatvāniveśe 'yo yo dhūmavān so 'gnimān' ityudāharaṇe 'so 'gnimān' iti bhāgāt 'dhūmavan vahnimān' ityākārakabodhasya jāyamānatayā tasya
GSP29antsdi_u:4164: doṣaḥ/ evaṃ pakṣaviśeṣyakatvamātroktau 'dravyaṃ vahnimat' iti vākye 'tivyāptiḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4169: dravyaṃ vahnimacca' iti vākyajanyasamūhālambanabodhasyāpi parvatatvāvacchinnaviśeṣyakatvāt vahnitvāvacchinnaprakārakatvācca tādṛśavākye 'tivyāptivāraṇāya
GSP29antsdi_u:4172: nyāyabahirbhūteti/ pañcāvayavakanyāyānantargatasya udāsīnasya 'parvato vahnimān' iti vākyasya nirāsaḥ/ evamagre 'pīti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4174: pañcamyantaṃ liṅgapratipādakaṃ heturiti dīpikā/ pañcamyantatve sati liṅgaviṣayakabodhajanakatve sati vākyatvamiti tadarthaḥ/ asti ca dhūmāditi bhāgasya tathātvamiti lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ pañcamyantatve satītyanupādāne udāharaṇāditriṣvativyāptiḥ/ teṣāmapi
GSP29antsdi_u:4175: liṅgabodhakatvāt/ ataḥ pañcamyantatve satītyuktam/ 'ayaṃ na daṇḍāt taddaṇḍasaṃyogājanyadravyatvāt' ityādau 'ayaṃ na daṇḍāt' iti pratijñāyāmapi pañcamyantatvasatvāt tatrātivyāptivāraṇāta liṅgabodhakatve satītyuktam/
GSP29antsdi_u:4177: vākyapadasya nyāyāvayavatvaparatayā nigamanāvayave tasmāditi bhāge nātivyāptiḥ/ tasya bhāgasya nyāyāvayavanigamanāvayavatve 'pi
GSP29antsdi_u:4178: nyāyāvayavatvāsvīkārāt/ na caivaṃ sati 'ayaṃ na daṇḍāt' iti pratijñāntargatasya daṇḍāditibhāgasya pratijñāvayavatve 'pi
GSP29antsdi_u:4179: nyāyāvayavatvābhāvādeva nātivyāptiriti liṅgapratipādakamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ vyarthamiti vācyam/ tarhi nyāyāvayavapratijñāvayavasyāpi nyāyāvayavatvādativyāptiprasakteḥ/ na ca tarhi nigamanāvayave tasmāditi bhāge 'tivyāptiriti vācyam/ pañcamyantatvamityanena prakṛtapakṣaviśeṣaṇatāpannasādhyānvitasvārthabodhakapañcamyantatvasya vivakṣitatvenādoṣādityāśayāt/ nanu
GSP29antsdi_u:4185: ityudāharaṇe agnipadasya dhūmavyāpakavahnau lakṣaṇā, vīpsitayatpadaṃ tatpadaṃ ca lakṣaṇātātparyagrāhakam/ tathā ca dhūmavān
GSP29antsdi_u:4186: dhūmavyāpakavahnimānityarthaḥ/ tena prakṛtahetumadviśeṣyakaprakṛtahetuvyāpakasādhyaprakārakabodhajanakavākyatvamudāharaṇasya lakṣaṇamiti labhyate/ upanayanigamanayoḥ īdṛśalakṣaṇābhāvāt nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ nanvevamapi 'dhūmavān
GSP29antsdi_u:4190: tatpadottarasādhyatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭasādhyavadbodhakapadasamudāyatvameva udāharaṇatvaṃ vivakṣitam/ ato na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ/ ādhikamanyatra/
GSP29antsdi_u:4195: tena 'parvato dhūmavān' iti vākyasyāpi vastuto vahnivyāpyo yo dhūmastatprakārakatvādativyāptiritiśaṅkāyāḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4196: hetasādhyavattayā pakṣapratipādakamiti dīpikāgranthāt hetumattayā sādhyavattayā ca pakṣapratipādakatvaṃ nigamanasya lakṣaṇamityavagamyate/
GSP29antsdi_u:4197: tathā sati nigamane 'sambhavaḥ/ 'tasmāt tathā' iti nigamanavākyasya sādhyavattayā pakṣabodhakatve 'pi hetumattayā pakṣabodhakatvābhāvāt/
GSP29antsdi_u:4199: vahnimāśca parvataḥ' iti vākye 'tivyāptiśca/ ato vyācaṣṭe -
GSP29antsdi_u:4200: hetujñāneti/ pañcamyāḥ jñānajñāpyatvamarthaḥ/ jñāne prakṛtyarthasya hetoḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4201: viṣayatāsambandhenānvayaḥ/ tathāśabdasya sādhyavānityarthaḥ/ sādhye pañcamyarthasya jñānajñāpyatvasyāśrayatayānvayaḥ/ tathā ca hetuviṣayakajñānajñāpyatvāśrayasādhyavān pakṣa ityākārakabodhaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4203: abādhitatvādikaṃ nigamanaprayojanamiti katham? nigamanavākyāt abādhitatvāsatpratipakṣitatvayorapratipakṣitatvayorapratipatterityāśaṅkyāha - uttarakālamiti/ tathā ca pūrvoktarītyā śābdabodhānantaraṃ ayaṃ heturabādhitaḥ asatpratipakṣaśceti mānasaṃ jñānamutpadyata iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4211: viśiṣṭaparāmarśasyānumitihetutvasthāpanam nanu vyāptismṛtipakṣadharmatājñānābhyāmeva anumitisambhave viśiṣṭaparāmarśaḥ kimarthamaṅgīkartavya iti cet-na/
GSP29antsdi_u:4213: iti śābdaparāmarśasthale parāmarśaṃsyāvaśyakatayā lāghavena sarvatra parāmarśasyaiva kāraṇatvāt/ liṅgaṃ na karaṇam, atītādau
GSP29antsdi_u:4214: vyabhicārāt/ 'vyāpāravat kāraṇaṃ karaṇam' iti mate parāmarśandvārā vyāptijñānaṃ karaṇam/ tajjanyatve sati tajjanyajanako
GSP29antsdi_u:4216: prakāśikā nanu viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhiparāmarśasya anumitiṃ prati hetutve tatrānanyathāsiddhatvaniyatapūrvavṛttitvayordvayoḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4217: gauravam/ 'vahnivyāpyo dhūmaḥ, dhūmavān parvataḥ' iti jñānadvayasya tava mate viśiṣṭaparāmarśaṃ prati kāraṇatvena kḷpyatasya karaṇatve tu ananyathāsiddhatvamātrasya kalpanīyatayā lāghavamiti prābhākaraḥ śaṅkate -
GSP29antsdi_u:4219: vyabhicārāt na jñānadvayasya kāraṇatvaṃ sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ/ kathañcidapi vyāpyatāvacchedakadhūmatvāderbhānaṃ parāmarśe na sambhavatīti sphoraṇāya
GSP29antsdi_u:4220: śābdeti/ lāghaveneti/ kalpanālāghavenetyarthaḥ/ tathā hi - jñānadvaye ananyathāsiddhatvaniyatapūrvavṛttitvayoḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4223: nnaviśeṣyakaniścayasyaiva kāraṇatāvacchedakatvaṃ jñānadvayasādhāraṇyenana tanmate mantavyam/ naiyāyikamate tu -
GSP29antsdi_u:4224: vyāptiviśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhiniścayatvaṃ kāraṇatāvacchedakamiti kāraṇatāvacchedakalāghavam avadheyam/ vinigamanāviraheṇa jñānamānaliṅgatvenāpi karaṇatvaṃ vadatāṃ ācāryāṇāṃ mataṃ nirasyati
GSP29antsdi_u:4226: tatrāpyanumiteranubhavasiddhatvena tadavyavahitapūrvaṃ bhūtabhaviṣyaddhūmāderasattvāditi bhāvaḥ/ mata iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4227: 'phalāyogavyavacchinnaṃ kāraṇaṃ karaṇam' iti mate parāmarśa eva karaṇamiti dhyeyam/ karaṇe ativyāptivāraṇāya - tajjanyatve satīti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4228: bālapriyā naiyāyikenāpi ādau dhūmadarśanam, tataḥ vyāptismaraṇam, tataḥ vahnivyāpyadhūmavānayamiti viśiṣṭaparāmarśaḥ, tato 'numitiriti
GSP29antsdi_u:4229: kramasya svīkaraṇīyatayā dhūmadarśanavyāptismṛtibhyāmeva anumitisambhavāt madhye viśiṣṭaparāmarśaḥ kimartha iti prābhākareṇa
GSP29antsdi_u:4230: śaṅkitam/ śaṅkeyaṃ nopapadyate/ viśiṣṭaparāmarśādeva anumitisambhave jñānadvayasya nānumitihetutvam anyathāsiddhatvāditi naiyāyikena vaktuṃ śakyatvāt/ ataḥ śaṅkiturāśayamabhivyanakti - nanu
GSP29antsdi_u:4233: jñānadvayasya tu ananyathāsiddhatvaṃ niyatapūrvavṛttitvaṃ cetyubhayaṃ kalpanīyam/ jñānadvayasya tu ananyathāsiddhatvamātraṃ kalpanīyam, na tu niyatapūrvavṛttitvamapi, kḷptatvāt/ ato lāghavāt jñānadvayamevānumitihetuḥ na tu viśiṣṭaparāmarśa iti prābhākarasya
GSP29antsdi_u:4234: bhāva ityāśayaḥ/ yatra 'vahnivyāpyavānayam' iti śabdaśravaṇāt 'ayaṃ vahnivyāpyavān' iti śābdabodhātmako viśiṣṭaparāmarśaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4236: nānumitihetutvamiti sarvatraiva tasya hetutvamiti rītyā prābhākaramataṃ dīpikāyāṃ khaṇḍitam/ nanu prābhākaramate jñānadvayasyāpi vyāptijñānatvena pakṣadharmatājñānatvena ca
GSP29antsdi_u:4237: kāraṇatvamiṣyate/ 'vahnivyāpyavānayam' iti śabdaparāmarśasyāpi vyāptijñānatvapakṣadharmatājñānatvarūpakāraṇatāvacchedakākrāntatvāt kāraṇatvamiṣyata eveti na vyabhicāra ityāśaṅkyāha -
GSP29antsdi_u:4238: kathañcidapīti/ yaṃa bhāvaḥ - vyāptijñānapakṣadharmatājñānayoḥ vyāptijñānatvapakṣadharmatājñānatvābhyāṃ kāraṇatvasvīkāre 'āloko
GSP29antsdi_u:4240: vahnimān' ityunamityāpattiḥ/ ato vyāpyatāvacchedakatayā gṛhītadharmāṃvacchinne pakṣadharmatāvagāhi jñānatvena kāraṇatvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4242: tathā ca vahnivyāpyavānayamiti jñāne vyāpyatāvacchedakadhūmatvāderabhānena uktakāraṇatāvacchedakānākrāntatayā kāraṇatāvacchedakāvacchinnaṃ vināpi kāryotpattyā vyatirekavyabhicāraḥ prābhākaramate durvāra iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4244: śābdaparāmarśādanumitiḥ yatra bhavati tatra jñānadvayaṃ vināpyanumiteranubhavasiddhatayā tatrāpi yadi jñānadvayādevānumitiriti kalpyate tarhi jñānadvayasyānanyathāsiddhatvaṃ niyatapūrvavṛttitvaṃ cetyubhaya kalpanīyam/ tatra viśiṣṭaparāmarśasya niyatapūrvavṛttitāyāḥ kḷptatayā ananyathāsiddhatvamātraṃ kalpanīyamiti naiyāyikamate lāghavamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4245: nanu śābdaparāmarśasthale naiyāyikasya mate lāghave 'pi yatra jñānadvayādevānumitiḥ tatra pūrvoktarītyā prābhākaramate lāghavamiti
GSP29antsdi_u:4249: dhūmavān' ityākārakaḥ/ tathā coktaniścayaviśiṣṭoktaniścayatvaṃ prābhākaramate anumitikāraṇatāvacchedakam/ naiyāyikamate tu vyāptiviśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhitvam/ tattu dhūmatvānavagāhini vahnivyāpyavānayamiti śābdaparāmarśeṃ'pyasti/ ataḥ kāraṇatāvacchedakalāghavāt naiyāyikamatameva yuktamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4250: vinigamanāviraheṇeti/ jñāyamānaṃ liṅgaṃ karaṇam atha vā liṅgaviṣayakajñānaṃ karaṇamiti
GSP29antsdi_u:4251: sādhutvasādhakayuktyabhāvenetyarthaḥ/ liṅgasya anumitikaraṇatve jñāyamānābhyāmatītānāgatābhyāṃ liṅgābhyāṃ anumitiḥ na syāt/
GSP29antsdi_u:4255: phalāyogavyavacchinnamiti/ kāryāvyavahitapūrvavṛttitvaviśiṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ karaṇamiti mate parāmarśasyaivānumityavyavahitapūrvaṃvṛttitayā tadave karaṇam,
GSP29antsdi_u:4256: vyāptijñānasya tu parāmarśavyavahitatvāt na karaṇatvamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4262: yatra dhūmas tatrāgnir yathā mahānasa ity anvayavyāptiḥ /
GSP29antsdi_u:4263: yatra vahnir nāsti tatra dhūmo'pi nāsti yathā mahāhrada
GSP29antsdi_u:4267: atra prameyatvābhidhyatvayor vyatirekavyāptir nāsti sarvasyāpi prameyatvād abhidheyatvāc ca
GSP29antsdi_u:4268: vyatirekamātravyāptikaṃ kevalavyatireki yathā pṛthivī tarebhyo bhidyate gandhavattvāt /
GSP29antsdi_u:4269: yad itarebhyo na bhidyate na tad gandhavat /
GSP29antsdi_u:4272: tasmān na tatheti atra yad gandhavat tad itarabhinnam ity anvayadṛṣṭanto nāsti pṛthivīmātrasya pakṣatvāt //
GSP29antsdi_u:4273: liṅgaṃ trividham - anvayavyatireki, kevalānvayi, kevalavyatireki ceti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4274: anvayavyatirekinirūpaṇam anvayena vyatirekeṇa ca vyāptimat anvayavyatireki/ yathā vahnau sādhye
GSP29antsdi_u:4275: dhūmavattvam/ yatra dhūmastatrāgniḥ yathā mahānasaḥ ityanvayavyāptiḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4276: yatra vahnirnāsti, tatra dhūmo 'pi nāsti yathā mahāhradaḥ iti
GSP29antsdi_u:4280: anvayavyatirekiṇaṃ lakṣaṇati - anvayeneti/ hetusādhyayoḥ vyāptiḥ anvayavyāptiḥ,
GSP29antsdi_u:4282: prakāśikā yadyapyanumānanirūpaṇasyaiva pratijñātatvena tadvibhāga eva ucitaḥ,
GSP29antsdi_u:4283: tathāpi liṅgasya traividhye pradarśite tajjñānasya traividhyaṃ phalatīti manasi kṛtvāha - liṅgaṃ vibhajata iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4284: 'anvayena vyatirekeṇa ca vyāptimat' iti mūlasya 'anvayasahacāragrahagrāhyavyāptimattve sati
GSP29antsdi_u:4289: vyatirekeṇa ca vyāptimat' iti yathāśrutamūlāt anvayavyāptimattve sati vyatirekavyāptimattvamanvayavyatirekiṇo
GSP29antsdi_u:4294: sādhyābhāvahetvabhāvayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyatirekasahacāraḥ tajjñānajanyajñānaviṣayībhūtā vyāptiḥ sādhyābhāvavyāpakībhūtābhāvapratiyogitvarūpā vyatirekavyāptiḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4297: tenānvayasahacārajñānajñāpyā vyāptiriti mūlāllabhyate/ evaṃ vyatirekaśabdaḥ vyatirekasahacāraparaḥ, tṛtīyārthaḥ jñānajñāpyatvam,
GSP29antsdi_u:4299: tarkasaṅgrahaḥ kevalānvayinirūpaṇam anvayamātravyāptikam kevalānvayi/ yathā ghaṭaḥ abhidheyaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4300: prameyatvāt paṭavat iti/ atra prameyatvābhidheyatvayoḥ vyatirekavyāptiḥ nāsti, sarvasyāpi prameyatvāt abhidheyatvācca/
GSP29antsdi_u:4301: dīpikā kevalānvayino lakṣaṇamāha - anvayeti/ kevalānvayisādhyakaṃ liṅgaṃ kevalānvayi/
GSP29antsdi_u:4305: prakāśikā anvayamātravyāptikatvarūpakevalānvayilakṣaṇe mātrapadena vyatirekavyāptervyavacchedyatayā siddhyasiddhibhyāṃ vyāghāta ityālocya prakārāntareṇa pariṣkaroti - kevalānvayisādhyakamiti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4307: 1. tathā ca anvayasahacārajñānajanyajñānaviṣayavyāptimatve sati vyatirekasahacārajñānajanyajñānaviṣayavyāptimattvaṃ anvayavyatirekiṇo lakṣaṇam/ tatra satyantānupādāne kevalavyatirekiṇyativyāptiḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4309: vyatirekasahacāreṇāpyanvayavyāptireva gṛhyata iti mate anavayasahacārajñānavyatirekasahacārajñānobhajajanyajñānaviṣayavyāptimattvaṃ anvayavyatirekiṇo lakṣaṇam/
GSP29antsdi_u:4310: saṅgrahāya sādhye kevalānvayitvaṃ niveśitam/ tadeva nirvakti - atyantābhāveti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4315: bālapriyā nanu 'anvayamātravyāptikaṃ kevalānvayī'ti mūlāt vyatirekavyāptiśūnyatve sati anvayavyāptimattvaṃ kevalānvayino lakṣaṇamiti pratīyate/ tathā sati kevalānvayini vyatirekavyāpteḥ prasiddhatve tacchūnyatvaṃ na sambhavati/ tasyāḥ aprasiddhatve sutarāṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4316: tacchūnyatvāprasiddhiriti lakṣaṇamidaṃ nopapadyata ityāśayena dīpikāyāṃ kevalānvayisādhyakaṃ kevalānvayi ityuktamityāha -
GSP29antsdi_u:4318: jñeyatvāt' ityādiḥ yathā kevalānvayī, tathā kevalānvayisādhyakaḥ vyatirekī heturapi 'idaṃ vācyaṃ ghaṭatvāt' ityādiḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4321: kevalānvayisādhyaketi/ vyatirekihetuḥ atyantābhāvapratiyogī hetuḥ/ tadeveti/ kevalānvayitvamevetyarthaḥ/ nanu atyantābhāvāpratiyogitvaṃ kevalānvayitvam, tatsādhyakahetutvaṃ kevalānvayiliṅgatvamityuktau ākāśābhāvasādhyakasya
GSP29antsdi_u:4324: saṅgraho na syāt saṃyogābhāvasya 2saṃyogātmakātyantābhāvapratiyogitvāt ityata āha - niravacchinnetyādi/
GSP29antsdi_u:4325: 1. ākāśarūpaḥ yaḥ ākāśābhāvātyantābhāvaḥ tatpratiyogitvenetyarthaḥ/ abhāvābhāvasya pratiyogisvarūpatvāditi
GSP29antsdi_u:4327: saṃyogasyāvyāpyavṛttitayā sāvacchinnavṛttikatvāt niravacchinnavṛttimān abhāvaḥ na saṃyogātmakaḥ abhāvaḥ, api tu ghaṭādyabhāvaḥ tadapratiyogitvaṃ saṃyogābhāve 'stīti tasya
GSP29antsdi_u:4328: kevalānvayitvopapattiḥ/ gaganarūpo 'bhāvastu na vṛttimān tasyāvṛttitvāt, api tu vṛttimān ghaṭādyabhāvaḥ tadapratiyogitvaṃ gaganābhāve 'stīti tasyāpi kevalānvayitvamupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ/ evaṃ ca yat sarvatrāsti, na kvāpi tadabhāvaḥ tat kevalānvayīti labhyate/
GSP29antsdi_u:4329: nanvabhidheyatvasya kathaṃ kevalānvayitvam/ abhidheyatvaṃ hi padaśaktimattvam/ tacca ghaṭapaṭādipadabhedena
GSP29antsdi_u:4331: sarvapadābhidheyatvamiti/ sarva iti yat padaṃ tadabhidheyatvaṃ sarvatrāstīti sarvapadābhidheyatvaṃ kevalānvayi/ tathā ca
GSP29antsdi_u:4333: prameyatvāt' iti prayoge sarvapadābhidheyatvaṃ sādhyaṃ iti kevalānvayitvamupapadyata iti
GSP29antsdi_u:4334: tarkasaṅgrahaḥ kevalavyatirekinirūpaṇam vyatirekamātravyāptikaṃ kevalavyatireki/ yathā pṛthivī itarebhyo bhidyate gandhavattvāt/ yat itarebhyo na bhidyate na tat
GSP29antsdi_u:4335: gandhavat yathā jalam/ na ceyaṃ tathā/ tasmāt na tathā iti/ atra yat gandhavat tat itarabhinnam ityanvayadṛṣṭāntaḥ nāsti,
GSP29antsdi_u:4338: yatheti/ nanu itarabhedaḥ prasiddho vā na vā/ ādye yatra prasiddhaḥ tatra hetusattve anvayitvam, asattve asādhāraṇyam/ dvītīye sādhyajñānābhāvāt kathaṃ tadviśiṣṭānumitiḥ/ viśeṣaṇajñānābhāve viśiṣṭajñānānadayāt pratiyogijñānābhāvāt
GSP29antsdi_u:4340: jalāditrayodaśānyonyābhāvānāṃ trayodaśasu pratyekaṃ prasiddhānāṃ melanaṃ pṛthivyāṃ sādhyate/ tatra trayodaśatvāvacchinnabhedātmakasādhyasyaikādhikaraṇavṛttitvābhāvāt nānvayitvāsādhāraṇye/ pratyekādhikaraṇaprasiddhyā sādhyaviśiṣṭānumitiḥ vyatirekavyāptinirūpaṇaṃ ceti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4342: tena 'pṛthivī itarebhyo bhidyate gandhavattvāt' ityādau anvayavyāptessattve 'pi na lakṣaṇāsaṅgatiḥ/ itadabhedaḥ -
GSP29antsdi_u:4349: pṛthivītarasāmānyabhedo na sādhyate, api tu jalādibhedakṛṭaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4350: sādhyate/ tathā ca toktadoṣāvasara ityāhajalādīti/ jalādīnāṃ ce trayodaśānyonyābhāvāsteṣāṃ kūṭaṃ sādhyata ityarthaḥ/ samudāyasya prasiddhyasambhavādāha - pratyekamini/ trayodaśatvāvacchinneti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4351: anumiteḥ pūrvaṃ niścitasādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnavato dharmiṇa evāprasiddhyā na tatra hetoḥ sattvāsattvanibandhane anvayitvāsādhāraṇye iti samuditārthaḥ/ pratyekaṃ prasiddhau apekṣābuddhiviśeṣaviṣayatvarūpasamudāyatvaviśiṣṭajñānaṃ sambhavati/
GSP29antsdi_u:4352: tathā ca viśeṣaṇatāvacchedakaprakārakanirṇayasya sadbhāvāt sādhyatāvacchedakaviśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhyanumitiḥ vyatirekavyāptijñānaṃ ca sambhavatītyāha - pratyekādhikaraṇetyādinā/ yadyapi jalādi caturdaśānyonyābhāvānāṃ caturdaśasu
GSP29antsdi_u:4353: pratyeka prasiddhānāmiti rītyā vaktumucitam, tathāpi arthāpatteḥ pramāṇāntaratvamaṅgīkurvantaṃ prābhākaramākṣeptuṃ vyatirekavyāpteranumityaṅgatvasya pradarśanīyatayā tanmatasādhāraṇyena vyatirekavyāptiṃ pradarśayituṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4356: kecittu - jalamevādiḥ yeṣāṃ trayodaśānāmiti vigraheṇa jalādipratiyogikānāṃ caturdaśānāmityarthaḥ/ trayodaśasviti/ jalādītyādiḥ/ uktavigraheṇa
GSP29antsdi_u:4358: bālapriyā nanu vyatirekamātravyāptikaṃ kevalavyatirekītyasya anvayavyāptiśūnyatve sati vyatirekavyāptimattvaṃ kevalavyatirekiṇo lakṣaṇamityarthaḥ/ tathā ca 'pṛthivī itarebhyo bhidyate gandhavattvāt' ityatra kevalavyatirekiṇi vastuto 'nvayavyāpterapi sattvādasambhavaḥ ityato vyācaṣṭe - niścitavyatireketi/ tathā coktasthale vastutaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4361: vyatirekavyāptiniścayastvastīti niścitavyatirekamātravyāptikatvasya sattvāt kevalavyatirekitvamupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4362: yatkiñciditarabhedasya prasiddhatvāt prasiddho na veti vikalpasyaiva nāvasara ityataḥ vyācaṣṭe
GSP29antsdi_u:4363: pṛthivītaratvāvacchinnapratiyogitākabheda iti/ pṛthivītareṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bheda ityarthaḥ/ tathā ca yadi pṛthivītareṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhedaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4364: kvacit ghaṭādau jñātaḥ tarhi tatra hetusattve sādhyahetvostatraivānvayasahacāragrahāt tadgrāhyānvayavyāptimattvamastīti anvayavyatirekyanumānameva bhavet na kevalavyatireke/ yadi tatra heturnāsti tarhi hetorniścitasādhyavadavṛttitvena sapakṣavyāvṛttatvarūpāsādhāraṇahetvābhāvalakṣaṇākrāntatayā
GSP29antsdi_u:4366: sādhyarūpaviśeṣaṇajñānābhāvāt sādhyaviśiṣṭapakṣajñānarūpā anumitirna syāt viśiṣṭabuddhau viśeṣaṇajñānasya kāraṇatvāt/ evaṃ sādhyasyājñātatve sādhyābhāvaghaṭitavyatirekavyāptijñānamapi na syāt/
GSP29antsdi_u:4369: nanu aprasiddhasādhyakasthale sādhyaviśeṣaṇikā pakṣaḥ sādhyavānityākārāna anumitirmā bhūt
GSP29antsdi_u:4370: pṛthivyāmitarabhedaḥ ityākārā sādhyaviśeṣyikā anumitiḥ bhavitumarhatyevetyāśaṅkyāha - aprasiddhasādhyake
GSP29antsdi_u:4371: sādhyaviśeṣaṇakānumitireveti/ sādhyaviśeṣaṇakānumitireva jāyata iti pakṣe viśeṣaṇajñānābhāvāt sā prakṛte na sambhavatīti
GSP29antsdi_u:4373: pratiyogijñānābhāvāt vyatirekavyāptijñānarūpakāraṇābhāvāt na sā sambhabatīti bhāvo varṇanīyaḥ/ jalādibhedakūṭamiti/ jalādīnāṃ pṛthivyatiriktānāṃ caturdaśānāṃ pratyekaṃ ye caturdaśa bhedāḥ tatsamūha ityarthaḥ/ jalādīnāṃ ye trayodaśānyonyābhāvā iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4374: nanu jalādyaṣṭadravyāṇāṃ guṇādiṣaṭpadārthānāṃ ca bhedaḥ pṛthivyāṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4375: sādhanīyaḥ/ tathā ca jalādicaturdaśānyonyābhāveti vaktavye trayodaśetyabhidhānamanucitamiti
GSP29antsdi_u:4379: tādṛśatrayodaśānyonyābhāvānāṃ jalādiṣu pratyekaṃ prasiddhānāṃ tanmate jalādirūpatayā jalādirūpatrayodaśabhedasya pṛthivyāmasattvena gandhavattvaliṅgena tatsādhanāsambhavāt/ pṛthivīniṣṭhasya tādṛśatrayodaśabhedasya pṛthivīrūpatayā jalādiṣu pratyekaṃ prasiddhyabhāvenāprasiddhyā uktarītyā vyatirekavyāptijñānāsambhavena
GSP29antsdi_u:4380: tatsādhanāsambhavāt/ ataḥ jalāditrayodaśānyonyābhāvānāmityasya jalamādiryeṣāṃ tu jalādayaḥ, jalādayastrayodaśa jalāditrayodaśa teṣāmanyonyābhāvā iti vigrahaḥ/ jalāditayatra atadguṇasaṃvijñāno bahuvrīhiḥ/ ato jalādīnāṃ caturdaśānāṃ ye caturdaśa anyonyābhāvāḥ teṣāṃ lābha iti vyākhyātavyam/ upari prakāśikāyāṃ sarvamidaṃ spaṣṭībhaviṣyati/
GSP29antsdi_u:4381: vastutastu jalādīnāṃ caturdaśānāṃ ye bhedāḥ caturdaśa te sarveṃ jalādiṣu na prasiddhāḥ/ tathā hi - jalabhedaḥ tejaḥprabhṛtiṣu trayodaśasu prasiddhaḥ, na tejasi/ evaṃrītyā trayodaśasu prasiddhaḥ yaḥ ekaikabhedaḥ teṣāṃ melanaṃ pṛthivyāṃ sādhyate/ arthāt caturdaṃśabhedasamudāyaḥ pṛthivyāṃ sādhyate/ trayodaśatvāvacchedena prasiddho yaḥ ekaikabhedaḥ tadghaṭitacaturdaśātmakasamudāyaḥ pṛthivyāṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4382: sādhyata iti yāvat/ evaṃ ca caturdaśatvaviśiṣṭabhedasya
GSP29antsdi_u:4384: sādhyaghaṭakaikābhāvasya trayodaśatvāvacchedena prasiddhatayā sādhyarūpaviśeṣaṇajñānasattvena sādhyaviśiṣṭānumitirupapadyate/ evaṃ sādhyātmakapratiyogijñānasattve sādhyābhāvajñānasambhavāt
GSP29antsdi_u:4386: niścitasādhyatāvacchedaketi/ sādhyatāvacchedakaṃ trayodaśatvaṃ caturdaśatvaṃ vā tadavacchinnāḥ bhedāḥ tadvata ityarthaḥ/ pratyekaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4389: tena caturdaśatvātmakaṃ yat viśeṣaṇatāvacchedakaṃ tatprakārakaḥ nirṇayaḥ hame bhedāḥ caturdaśa ityākārakaḥ utpadyate/ tataḥ caturdaśatvaviśiṣṭabhedavatī pṛthivī ityākārikā viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhinī anumitiḥ sulabhā/
GSP29antsdi_u:4391: vastutastu kevalavyatirekyanumānasthale sādhyaviśeṣyikaivānumitiḥ/ ataḥ pūrvaṃ sādhyasyāprasiddhāvapi na kṣatiḥ/ evaṃ pṛthivītarabhedābhāvatvena rūpeṇa
GSP29antsdi_u:4392: sādhyābhāvasya vyatirekavyāptighaṭakatayā na praveśaḥ, yena pratiyogyapratisaddhyā abhāvāprasiddheḥ vyatirekavyāptijñānasya daurlabhyaṃ bhavet/ api tu pṛthivītaratvavyāpakībhūtābhāvapratiyogi
GSP29antsdi_u:4393: gandhavatī pṛthivī ityeva parāmarśaḥ/ ataḥ dīpikāyāmāśritaḥ prayāso viphala iti prāhuḥ/ 1pakṣatādīdhityādau spaṣṭametat/
GSP29antsdi_u:4397: sandigdhasādhyavān pakṣaḥ/ yathā dhūmavattve hetau parvataḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4399: sandigdheti/ nanu śravaṇānantarabhāvimananasthale avyāptiḥ/ tatra vedavākyairātmano niścitatvena sandehābhāvāt/ kiṃ ca pratyakṣe 'pi
GSP29antsdi_u:4400: vahnau yatra icchayā anumitiḥ tatra avyāptiriti cet-na/
GSP29antsdi_u:4402: prakāśikā mūle sandigdhasādhyavāniti/ viśeṣyatāsambandhena sādhyaprakārakasaṃśayaviśiṣṭa ityarthaḥ/ sapakṣalakṣaṇādikamapyevaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4410: ityākārake saṃśaye vahniḥ prakāraḥ parvato viśeṣya iti
GSP29antsdi_u:4411: 1. ata eva prasiddhasādhyakasthale pakṣaviśeṣyikaivānumitiranubhūyate' iti pakṣatāyāṃ dīdhitigranthaḥ/ atra prasiddhasādhyakasthale pakṣaviśeṣyakānumitiriti kathanāt aprasiddhasādhyakasthale
GSP29antsdi_u:4415: sādhyaprakārakatādṛśasaṃśayasya viśeṣyatāsambandhena parvate sattvāt parvatasya pakṣatā/ prakāratāsambandhena tādṛśasaṃśayasya vahnau
GSP29antsdi_u:4417: sapakṣalakṣaṇādikamapyevaṃ pariṣkartavyamiti/ viśeṣyatāsambandhena sādhyaprakārakanirṇayaviśiṣṭaḥ sapakṣaḥ, viśeṣyatāsambandhena sādhyābhāvaprakārakanirṇayaviśiṣṭaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4419: pariṣkartavyamityarthaḥ/ saṃśayavighaṭaketi/ ātmā dehendriyādivilakṣaṇo na veti sandehasya pratibandhakaḥ yaḥ vedavākyajanyaḥ śābdabodhaḥ ātmā dehendriyādivilakṣaṇaḥ ityākārakaḥ tatra tādṛśaśābdabodhātmakaśravaṇānantaraṃ ātmā dehendriyādivilakṣaṇa ityākārakānumitirūpaṃ mananaṃ na syāt/
GSP29antsdi_u:4441: vyāptyādiviśiṣṭahetūnnirūpyetyarthaḥ/ saddhetunirūpaṇe asaddhetusmaraṇāta prasaṅgasaṅgatyā tannirūpaṇamiti bhāvaḥ/ mūle hetvābhāsā iti/ hetuvadābhāsanta iti hetvābhāsāḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4442: duṣṭahetavo nirūpyanta ityarthaḥ/ nanu sāmānyadharmaprakārakajñānamantarā viśeṣajijñāsānudayena
GSP29antsdi_u:4443: savyabhicāretyādinā vibhāgo 'nucita ityāśaṅkāṃ parijihīrṣuḥ doṣalakṣaṇe 'bhihite doṣavattvarūpaduṣṭalakṣaṇasyātisphaṭatvāt lābho bhavatītyāśayena doṣasāmānyalakṣaṇamāha - anumitīti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4445: teṣāṃ bhāvaḥ tattvamityarthaḥ/ 'hrado vahnimān' ityādyanumitiṃ prati 'vahnyabhāvavān hrada' ityādibādhaniścayaḥ pratibandhakaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4447: lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ atrānumitipadaṃ ajahallakṣaṇayā anumititatkaraṇānyataraparam/ tena vyabhicārādijñānasya parāmarśapratibandhakatayaiva nirvāhāt anumityapratibandhakatve 'pi
GSP29antsdi_u:4448: vyabhicārādiṣu nāvyāptiḥ/ 'parvato nirvahniḥ' iti bādhabhramasya 'parvato vahnimān' ityanumitipratibandhakatvāt tadviṣayavahnyabhāvādau ativyāptiḥ ataḥ yathārtheti/ bhramābhinnetyarthaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4450: 'vahnyabhāvavān hradaḥ' ityākārakayarthārthajñānaviṣayatvasya tatra sattvāditi cet-na/ yadrūpāvacchinnaviṣayakajñānasāmānyaṃ anumitipratibandhakaṃ tadrūpāvacchinnatvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4454: yadrūpapadenopādānāsambhavāt/ na ca tarhi yathārthapadaṃ vyartham/
GSP29antsdi_u:4455: 'parvato nirvahniḥ' iti bhramaviṣaye 'pi vahnyabhāvādāvativyāpteḥ uktarītyaiva vāraṇāditi vācyam/ jñānapadasya jñānaviśeṣatātparyagrāhakatayā yathārthapadasārthakyāt/ evaṃ ca yadrūpāvacchinnaviṣayakānāhāryāprāmāṇyajñānānāskanditaniścayasāmānyaṃ prakṛtānumitipratibandhakaṃ tadrūpāvacchinnatvaṃ doṣatvamityarthaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4459: pare tu - idaṃ duṣṭānāmeva lakṣaṇam/ parantu jñāyamānavyabhicārādeḥ pratibandhakatvamabhyupetya/ tadarthastu anumitipratibandhakā ye
GSP29antsdi_u:4460: vyabhicārādayaḥ ekajñānaviṣayaprakṛtahetutāvacchedakavattvasambandhena tatprakārakayathārthajñānaviśeṣyatvam/ 'dhūmavān vahneḥ' ityādau dhūmābhāvavadvṛttitvaviśiṣṭavahniḥ vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29antsdi_u:4464: yathārthapadānupādāne darśitasambandhena vyabhicāraprakārakabhramaviśeṣyatvasya saddhetāvapi sattvenātivyāptiḥ syāditi tanniveśa ityāhuḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4470: tattu duṣṭahetūnāmeva bhavati, saddhetūnāṃ tatpramāviṣayatvāditi hetvābhāsaśabdaḥ duṣṭahetupara iti bhāvaḥ/ lakṣaṇasamanvaya iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4471: tathā ca 'hrado vahnimān dhūmāt' ityatra vahnyabhāvavaddhradātmakaḥ bādhaḥ doṣaḥ/ tādṛśadoṣavattvaṃ ca hetoḥ dhūmasya ekajñānaviṣayaprakṛtahetutāvacchedakavattvasambandhenāstīti duṣṭatvam/
GSP29antsdi_u:4472: 'vahnyabhāvavaddhradaḥ dhūmatvaṃ ca' ityekajñāne bādhasya dhūmatvasya ca
GSP29antsdi_u:4474: nanvanumitipratibandhakayathārthajñānaviṣayatvaṃ yadi doṣalakṣaṇaṃ tadā bādhasatpratipakṣayorevedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ samanviyāt/ bādhaniścayasya satpratipakṣaniścayasya ca 'hrado vahnyabhāvavān' ityākārakasya 'hrado
GSP29antsdi_u:4475: vahnyabhāvavyāpyaśaivālavān' ityākārakasya ca tadvattābuddhiṃ prati tadabhāvavattāniścayavidhayā tadabhāvavyāpyavattāniścayavidhayā ca
GSP29antsdi_u:4479: anumitikaraṇaparāmarśapratibandhakatvasyaiva vyabhicārādijñāneṣu sattvādityata āha - atrānumitipadamiti/ tathā ca anumititatkaraṇānyatarapratibandhakayathārthajñānaviṣayatvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4480: hetvābhāsalakṣaṇam/ parāmarśapratibandhakatayaiveti/ vyabhicārajñānaṃ parāmarśe vyāptibhānāṃśe pratibandhakam/ virodhajñānaṃ sādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyāṃśabhāne pratibandhakam/ svarūpāsiddhijñānaṃ pakṣadharmatvabhāne pratibandhakamiti sarveṣāṃ anumitikaraṇaparāmarśapratibandhakasattvāt nāvyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4482: parvato nirvahniriti/ tathā ca yathārthapadānupādāne parvate vahnyabhāvavānityākārakabhramasya 'parvato vahnimān'
GSP29antsdi_u:4483: ityanumitipratibandhakatvāt tādṛśabhramaviṣayasya vahnyabhāvasya doṣatvaṃ syāt/ tadvāraṇāya yathārthapadam/ uktabhramasya yathārthatvābhāvāt nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ nanu yathārthapadopādāne 'pi 'parvato vahnyabhāvavān' iti
GSP29antsdi_u:4485: vahnyabhāvatvavati vahnabhāvatvaprakārakatvena ca tadvati tatprakārakatvarūpayathārthalakṣaṇākrāntatvena yathārthatvādityata āha -
GSP29antsdi_u:4487: tadabhāvavati tatprakārakabhinnārthakam/ 'parvato vahnyabhāvavān' iti jñānaṃ tu vahnyabhāvābhāvavati vahnyabhāvaprakārakatayā bhramātmakam,
GSP29antsdi_u:4488: tadbhinnaṃ na bhavatīti na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ/ bhramabhinnatvameva sarvāṃśe pramātvamityucyate/ tacca 1svavyadhikaraṇaprakārāvacchinna yā yā viśeṣyatā tattadanirūpakatvam/
GSP29antsdi_u:4491: bhramīyaśuktiniṣṭhaviśaṣyatāyā svapadena upādāne svādhikaraṇaṃ śuktiḥ tadavṛttiḥ yaḥ prakāraḥ rajatatvaṃ tadavacchinnā yā viśeṣyatā śuktiniṣṭhaviśeṣyatā tannirūpakatvam idaṃ rajatamiti bhrame tadanirūpakatvaṃ idaṃ rajatamiti pramāyāmiti lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4497: vahnimān dhūmāt' ityatra 'hrado vahnyabhāvavān' iti niścayasya pratibandhakatayā tadviṣayatvaṃ vahnyabhāvavaddhra iva vahnyabhāve 'pyasti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4504: ityākārakānumitipratibandhakatvaṃ nāsti/ ataḥ vahnyabhāvavaddhradatvameva yadrūpapadena dhartavyam/
GSP29antsdi_u:4506: tadrūpāvacchinnatvaṃ ca vahnyabhāvavaddhrada evāsti na vanhyabhāva iti nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/ na ca tarhīti/ 'parvato vanhyabhāvavān' iti bhramaviṣaye vanhyabhāve 'tivyāptivāraṇāya hi yathārthapadamupāttam/
GSP29antsdi_u:4510: 'parvato vanhimān' ityanumitipratibandhakatvābhāvāt/ tathā ca vanhyabhāve 'tivyāptyaprasaktyā yathārthapadaṃ vyarthamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4511: jñānaviśeṣatātparyagrāhakatayeti/dya jñānapadena anāhāryamapramāṇyajñānānāskanditaṃ niścayātmakaṃ ca jñānamatra
GSP29antsdi_u:4513: svaṃ idaṃ rajatamitibhramīyā rajatatvaniṣṭhā prakāratā tannirūpitatvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4515: evaṃ svaṃ rajatatvaniṣṭhaprakāratā tadāśrayaḥ rajatatvaṃ tadabhāvavacchaktivṛttitvaṃ ca viśeṣyatāyāmasti/ tādṛśaviśeṣyatānirūpakatvaṃ bhrame anirūpakatvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4519: iti bādhakajñānakāle 'hrade vanhyabhāvajñānaṃ bhavatu' itīcchayā jāyamānasya 'hrado vanhyabhāvavān' iti jñānasyāpi vanhyabhāvavaddhradatvāvacchinnaviṣayakajñānasāmānyāntargatatayā tasya cānumitipratibandhakatvābhāvādavyāptisyāt bādhe/ tadvāraṇāya pratibanadhakajñāne 'nāhāryatvaṃ niveśanīyam/ evaṃ aprāmāṇyajñānānāskanditatvaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyasambandhena
GSP29antsdi_u:4521: iti jñānānantaraṃ 'idaṃ jñānaṃ apramā' iti jñānaṃ tatra
GSP29antsdi_u:4523: evaṃ niścayātmakatvāniveśe 'hrado vanhimān na vā' iti saṃśayātmakajñānasya jñānasāmānyāntargatasya apratibandhakatayā avyāptiḥ syāt/ ataḥ tanniveśaḥ/ tathā ca yaddharmāvacchinnaviṣayakānāhāryāprāmāṇyajñānānāskanditaniścayasāmānyaṃ prakṛtānumitipratibandhakaṃ taddharmāvacchinnatvaṃ hetudoṣasya lakṣaṇamiti paryavasannam/
GSP29antsdi_u:4525: pūrvasmin kalpe anumitipratibandhakaṃ yathārthaḥ jñānamiti karmadhārayaḥ/ asmin kalpe anumitipratibandhakānāṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4527: ityanumitipratibandhakaḥ vanhyabhāvavaddhradātmako bādhaḥ tatprakārakayathārthajñānaṃ ekajñānaviṣayaprakṛtahetutāvacchedakavattvasambandhena 'vanhyabhāvavaddhradavān dhūmaḥ' ityākārakaṃ tadviśeṣyatvaṃ dhūme 'stīti dhūmasya duṣṭatvam/ 'parvato dhūmavān vanheḥ' ityatra vyabhicāriṇi anumitipratibandhakaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4528: dhūmābhāvavadvṛttitvaviśiṣṭavanhirūpo vyabhicāraḥ tatprakārakayathārthajñānaṃ uktasambandhena tādṛśavyabhicāravān vanhiḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4532: vyabhicāraḥ dhūmābhāvavadvṛttivaviśiṣṭavanhirūpa ekajñānaviṣayaprakṛtahetutāvacchedakavattvasambandhena tatprakārakaṃ yat yathārthajñānaṃ tādṛśavanhimān dhūma ityākārakaṃ tadviśeṣyatvasya dhūme sattvāt ityata āha - anumitipadasya
GSP29antsdi_u:4536: tathā ca 'parvato vanhimān' ityanumitirevopādeyatayā tatpratibandhakadoṣāprasiddhyā nātivyāptiriti
GSP29antsdi_u:4544: yathā parvato vahnimān prameyatvād iti prameyatvasya vahnyabhāvavati hrade vidyamānatvāt /
GSP29antsdi_u:4547: śabdatvaṃ sarvebhyo nityebhyo'ntyebhyaś ca vyāvṛttaṃ śabdamātravṛtti /
GSP29antsdi_u:4553: tatra sādhyābhāvavadvṛttiḥ sādhāraṇaḥ/ yathā parvato vanhimān prameyatvāt/ atra prameyatvasya vanhyabhāvavati (sādhyābhāvavati) hrade vidyamānatvāt/
GSP29antsdi_u:4555: śabdatvāt/ atra śabdatvaṃ sarvebhyaḥ nityebhyaḥ anityebhyo vyāvṛttam
GSP29antsdi_u:4557: anvayavyatirekadṛṣṭāntarahito 'nupasaṃhārī/ yathā sarvamanityaṃ prameyatvāt/ atra sarvasyāpi pakṣatvāt dṛṣṭānto nāsti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4571: tattatsādhyābhāvasya sambandhāntarāvacchinnasādhyasāmānyābhāvasya ca sattve 'pi sādhyābhāvavati dhūmāvayavādau samavāyādinā
GSP29antsdi_u:4572: dhūmādervṛttitve 'pi ca nātivyāptiḥ/ atra ca sādhyābhāvavattāyāṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4573: sambandhaviśeṣāvacchinnatvāniveśe 'vanhimān dhūmāt' ityādau vanhyādyabhāvasya kālikasambandhena parvatādau vṛtterativyāptiḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4575: viśeṣaṇatāviśeṣaṇādhikaraṇāprasiddhyāvyāptiḥ/ ataḥ sādhyatāvacchedakasaṃbandhena sādhyavattāgrahaṃ pratiyeya sambandhena sādhyābhāvavattāniścayaḥ pratibandhakaḥ tena sambandhena sādhyābhāvavattvaṃ vivakṣaṇīyam/ vanhyādau sādhye tādṛśasambandho daiśikāviśeṣaṇatā,
GSP29antsdi_u:4576: ghaṭatvābhāvādau ca sādhye samavāyastatheti na doṣaḥ/ 'kapisaṃyogī
GSP29antsdi_u:4579: upadheyasaṅkare 'pyupādherasaṅkara iti nyāyāt, tasya viruddhasādhāraṇye 'pi kṣativirahāt/ mūle sarvasapakṣavyāvṛtta iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4585: saddhetāvapi pakṣe sādhyasandehadaśāyāmasādhāraṇyasya prakṛtaparāmarśakālikaviruddhaparāmarśadaśāyāṃ satpratipakṣasya ca svīkāre bādhabhramadaśāyāṃ bādhasyāpyaṅgīkārāpatteḥ/ na hi vaiṣamye
GSP29antsdi_u:4586: yuktiṃ paśyāmaḥ/ evaṃ cātra sapakṣapadaṃ kevalasādhyavatparam/ 'śabdo
GSP29antsdi_u:4590: anvayavyatirekadṛṣṭāntarahitatvaṃ ca kiñcidviśeṣyakaniścayāviṣayasādhyakatve sati kiñcidviśeṣyakaniścāviṣayasādhyābhāvakatvam/ navīnamate tu -
GSP29antsdi_u:4595: dhūmāt' ityatra dhūmasyāpi sādhāraṇahetvābhāsatvāpattiḥ/ tathā hi -
GSP29antsdi_u:4598: sattvāditi/ sādhyatāvacchedakadharmāvacchinnatvasya pratiyogitāyāṃ niveśe tu mahānasīyavanhyabhāvo grahītuṃ na śakyate, tasya mahānasīyatvasahitavanhitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākatve 'pi
GSP29antsdi_u:4599: kevalavanhitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākatvābhāvāt/ api tu vanhirnāstīti pratītisiddhaḥ vanhisāmānyābhāva eva vanhitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākaḥ tadvān hradādiḥ tannirūpitādheyatvaṃ dhūme nāstīti nātivyāptiḥ/ evaṃ sādhyaniṣṭhapratiyogitāyāṃ sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvāniveśe 'parvato vanhimān
GSP29antsdi_u:4600: dhūmāt' ityatraiva samavāyena vanhirnāstīti pratītisiddhasya samavāyasambandhāvacchinnavanhitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvasyāpi lakṣaṇaghaṭakatayā tadvān parvato 'pi tatra saṃyogena vanheḥ satve 'pi
GSP29antsdi_u:4602: sattvādativyāptiḥ/ sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvaniveśe tu saṃyogasambandhāvacchinnavanhyabhāvasyaiva grāhyatayā tadvān hradādireva tanniyapitādheyatvaṃ dhūme nāstīti nātivyāptiḥ/ ādheyatāyāṃ hetutāvacchedakasambandhāvacchinnatvāniveśe saṃyogasambandhāvacchinnavanhyabhāvavān dhūmāvayavo 'pi'
GSP29antsdi_u:4603: tannirūpitādheyatvaṃ dhūme 'stītyativyāptiḥ syāt/ tanniveśe tu dhūmāvayavanirūpitasamavāyasambandhāvacchinnādheyatvasya dhūme sattve 'pi
GSP29antsdi_u:4609: tatra ca sādhyābhāvavattāyāmityādi/ sādhyābhāvavattāyāṃ yadi sambandhaviśeṣāvacchinnatvaṃ na niveśyate tarhi saṃyogasambandhāvacchinnavanhitvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvasya kālikasaṃbandhenādhikaraṇaṃ parvato 'pi bhavatīti tannirūpitādheyatvasya dhūme sattvāt saddhetāvativyāptiḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4610: sādhyābhāvaniṣṭhasvarūpasambandhāvacchinnādheyatānirūpitādhikaraṇatvaṃ sādhyābhāvavattvamiti vivakṣaṇe ca yadyapi vahnyabhāvasya svarūpasambandhenādhikaraṇaṃ na parvataḥ, api tu hradādireva
GSP29antsdi_u:4613: vyabhicāriṇyativyāptiḥ/ tathā hi- sādhyābhāvavati ghaṭatvābhāvābhāvavati ghaṭatvavati ghaṭe dravyatvasattvāt ayaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4615: ghaṭatvarūpaḥ tasya svarūpasambandhenādhikaraṇamaprasiddham/ bhāvānāṃ svarūpasambandhena kvāpyavṛtterityavyāptiḥ/ ataḥ sādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmakasambandhena sādhyābhāvavattvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4619: prati yatsambandhāvacchisādadhyābhāvaniṣṭhaprakāratāśāliniścayaḥ pratibandhakaḥ sa sambandhaḥ sādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmaka iti kathyate/ 'parvanto
GSP29antsdi_u:4620: dhūmavān vanheḥ' ityatra 'parvataḥ saṃyogena dhūmavān' iti buddhiṃ prati 'parvataḥ svarūpasambandhena dhūmābhāvavān' iti niścayaḥ pratibandhakaḥ iti svarūpasambandha eva sādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmakaḥ tena sambandhena dhūmābhāvavān ayogolakaḥ tannirūpitādheyatvaṃ vanhāvastīti lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4622: vanhimān' iti buddhiṃ prati vanhyabhāvasya svarūpasaṃbandhenādhikaraṇaṃ parvata iti niścaya eva pratibandhakaḥ, na tu kālikasambandhena
GSP29antsdi_u:4624: 'parvataḥ saṃyogena vahnimān' iti buddherutpatteḥ/ tathā ca svarūpasambandhasyaiva sādhyavattāgrahavirodhatāniyāmakatayā tena sambandhena vahnyabhāvādhikaraṇaṃ hradādireva tannirūpitādheyatvaṃ dhūme nāstīti
GSP29antsdi_u:4627: ghaṭatvābhāvavān' iti sādhyavattābuddhiṃ prati paṭaḥ ghaṭatvābhāvābhāvavān (samavāyena ghaṭatvavān) ityākārakaḥ niścayaḥ pratibandhaka iti samavāyaḥ sādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmakasambandhaḥ tena sambandhena
GSP29antsdi_u:4633: sādhyatāvacchedakasambandhena sādhyatāvacchedakadharmeṇa ca sādhyaprakārakajñānaṃ prati yena sambandhena sādhyābhāvaprakārakaniścayaḥ pratibandhakaḥ sa sādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmaka iti kathyate/
GSP29antsdi_u:4635: niścaya eva pratibandhakaḥ na tu sāvacchinnaviśeṣaṇatāsambandhena kapisaṃyogābhāvavāniti niścayaḥ vṛkṣaḥ mūlāvacchedena kapisaṃyogābhāvavāniti niścaye satyapi vṛkṣaḥ agre kapisaṃyogavāniti buddhyutpatteḥ/ tathā ca sādhyavattāgrahavirodhitāniyāmakena niravacchinnaviśeṣaṇatāsambandhena kapisaṃyogābhāvavān 1guṇādireva tannirūpitādheyatvaṃ etadvṛkṣatve nāstīti
GSP29antsdi_u:4642: dravyatvarūpasādhyābhāvavati guṇe sattāyāḥ sattvena viśiṣṭaśuddhayoranatirekāt guṇakarmānyatvaviśiṣṭasattāyāmapi sādhyābhāvavannirūpitādhayatāyāḥ sattvāt ityata āha - digiti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4645: guṇavṛttitayā sādhyābhāvavadguṇanirūpitādheyatāvacchedakaṃ sattātvameva na tu guṇakarmānyatvaviśiṣṭasattātvarūpaṃ hetutāvacchedakamiti nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4649: sādhāraṇalakṣaṇasyātivyāptiriti śaṅkate - na ca viruddha iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4650: upadheyasaṅkare 'pīti/ ekasmin aneke doṣāḥ saṃbhavantīti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4653: 1. guṇādireveti/ na tu vṛkṣaḥ, tatra mūlādyavacchinnaviśeṣaṇatāsambanadhanaiva kapisaṃyogābhāvasattvāditi
GSP29antsdi_u:4654: asādhāraṇalakṣaṇe sapakṣaśabdasya niścitasādhyavānityarthaḥ/ viśeṣyatāsambandhena sādhyaprakārakaniścayavāniti yāvat/ sapakṣavṛttitvasāmānyābhāvavān sapakṣavṛttitvatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākābhāvavān asādhāraṇa iti

GSP29antsdi_u:4741: sopādhika iti/ vyāpyatvāsiddhiḥ vyāptyabhāvaḥ, tasyāḥ sopādhikahetau niyamena sattvāt sopādhiko vyāpyatvāsiddha eva na tvatirikto hetvābhāsa iti

GSP29antsdi_u:4752: sādhyavyāpakībhūtābhāvapratiyogitvaparyavasitam/ śabdaḥ nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt ityatra sādhyaṃ nityatvam, tadvyāpakībhūtaḥ abhāvaḥ kṛtakatvābhāvaḥ tatpratiyogitvaṃ kṛtakatve 'stīti lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/

GSP29antsdi_u:4806: iti/ yaddharmaviśiṣṭasādhyavyāpakatvaṃ taddharmaviśiṣṭasādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ lakṣaṇe niveśanīyam/ anyathā parvatatvātmakapakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakasya kasyacit
GSP29antsdi_u:4810: prāgabhāvo vināśī janyatvāditi/ atra janyatvaṃ pakṣadharmo na bhavatīti sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakatvaghaṭitalakṣaṇam/
GSP29antsdi_u:4812: bālapriyā nanu sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpakatvarūpaṃ mūloktamupādhilakṣaṇam
GSP29antsdi_u:4813: 'parvato vahnimān dhūmāt' ityādisaddhetau tattadvahnau (mahānasīyādivahnau) ativyāptam/ mahānasīyavahnerapi vahnitvena rūpeṇa vahnisāmānyarūpasādhyavyāpakatvāt mahānasīyavahnitvena
GSP29antsdi_u:4815: mahānasīyavahnitvena rūpeṇa mahānasīyavahnerabhāvāt/ evaṃ tatraiva ālokasyopādhitvāpattiḥ/ vahnimati sarvatra saṃyogasambandhena
GSP29antsdi_u:4816: ālokasya vidyamānayatā saṃyogasambandhena sādhyavyāpakatvāt/ evaṃ sādhanadhūmavati parvate samavāyasambandhena ālokasyāvidyamānatayā samavāyasambandhena sādhanāvyāpakatvāccetyāśaṅkyāha sādhyavyāpakatvasādhanāvyāpakatve iti/ tathā ca ye sambandhena yena rūpeṇacopādheḥ sādhyavyāpakatvam, tenaiva sambandhena tenaiva rūpeṇa ca tasya sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ vivakṣitam/ ato vahnitvena vahnivyāpakasya mahānasīyādivahneḥ mahānasīyavahnitvena
GSP29antsdi_u:4818: nātivyāptiḥ/ evaṃ saṃyogena vahnivyāpakasya ālokasya samavāyena dhūmāvyāpakatve 'pi tenaiva saṃyogasambandhena dhūmāvyāpakatvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4827: pratyakṣasparśāśrayatvāt' ityatra udbhūtarūpavattvamupādhiḥ/ tatra mūloktaṃ sādhyavyāpakatvaghaṭitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāsti/
GSP29antsdi_u:4828: pratyakṣatvarūpasādhyavati ātmani udbhūtarūpābhāvādityavyāptiḥ prasajyate/ tāṃ vārayituṃ lakṣyabhedena lakṣaṇabhedo vaktavya iti upādhiḥ caturvindha
GSP29antsdi_u:4829: ityādidīpikāyā āśaya iti bhāvaḥ/ tathā ca kevalasādhyavyāpakasyopādheḥ kevalasādhyavyāpakatve
GSP29antsdi_u:4832: udāsīnadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakasyopādheḥ udāsīnadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakatve sati tadavacchinnasādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ lakṣaṇamiti rītyā lakṣaṇabhedo vivakṣita iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4835: anyatheti/ 'parvato vahnimān dhūmāt' ityatra parvatīyavahneḥ parvatatvātmako yaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ tadviśiṣṭavahnivyāpakatvamasti sādhanāvyāpakatvaṃ cāsti/ dhūmavati mahānase parvatīyavahnerabhāvāt
GSP29antsdi_u:4836: iti parvatīyavahnirupādhiḥ syāt/ dharmaikyavivakṣaṇe tu parvatatvaviśiṣṭavahnivyāpakasya parvatīyavahneḥ parvatatvaviśiṣṭa
GSP29antsdi_u:4837: dhūmāvyāpakatvaṃ nāsti/ parvatatvaviśiṣṭadhūmavati parvate parvatīyavahneḥ sattvāt/ ato nātivyāptiriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4838: dīpikāyāṃ ādyaḥ ārdrendhanasaṃyoga iti/ 'parvato dhūmavān vahneḥ' ityatra ādrendhanasaṃyoga upādhiḥ/ sa ca dhūmarūpasādhyavyāpakaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:4842: udbhūtarūpavattvamupādhiḥ/ sa ca kevalasādhyavyāpako na bhavati pratyakṣaviṣayatvarūpasādhyavatyātmani udbhūtarūpavattvābhāvāt/ ataḥ pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpako 'yamupādhiḥ/ pakṣasya dharmaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ tadavacchinnaḥ tadviśiṣṭaḥ tatsamānādhikaraṇaḥ ya sādhyaḥ tadvyāpakaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:4843: prakṛte pakṣaḥ vāyuḥ tadvṛttidharmaḥ bahirdravyatvaṃ tadviśiṣṭaṃ yatpratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ tat ātmani nāsti, ātmano
GSP29antsdi_u:4844: bahirdravyatvarūpaviśeṣaṇābhāvāt/ ato bahirdravyatvaviśiṣṭapratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ yatra yatrāsti pṛthivyādau tatra
GSP29antsdi_u:4847: sādhanaṃ yatrāstivāyau tatra udbhūtarūpaṃ nāstīti pakṣadharmāvacchinnasādhanāvyāpakaṃ codbhūtarūpavattvaṃ

GSP29antsdi_u:4850: vināśī janyatvāt' ityatra bhāvatvamupādhiriṣyate/ sa kevalasādhyavyāpako na bhavati,
GSP29antsdi_u:4851: vināśitvarūpasādhyavati prāgabhāve bhāvatvābhāvāt/ ataḥ sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpako 'yamupādhiḥ/ janyatvarūpasādhanaviśiṣṭaṃ vināśitvaṃ yatra yatrāsti ghaṭādau tatra bhāvatvasadbhāvāditi bhāvaḥ/

GSP29antsdi_u:4857: tadavacchinnaṃ janyatvaviśiṣṭaṃ vināśitvaṃ yatrāsti ghaṭādau tatra bhāvatvasattvāt janyatvaviśiṣṭaprameyatvavati prāgabhāve bhāvatvasyābhāvācca bhāvatvaṃ udāsīnadharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakaḥ udāsīnadharmāvacchinnasādhanāvyāpakaścopādhiriti bhāvaḥ/

GSP29antsdi_u:4859: ātmānyadravyatvamiti/ vāyuḥ pratyakṣa ityatra pratyakṣapadasya bahirindriyajanyapratyakṣaviṣaya iti yadyarthaḥ tadodbhūtarūpavattvaṃ 1kevalasādhyavyāpaka evopādhiḥ/ yadā tu pratyakṣaviṣayatvamātraṃ sādhyaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:4861: sampādayitumiti/ yadi janyatvameva hetuḥ syāt tadā sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakatvamevopādherbhavet

GSP29antsdi_u:5107: vākyārthaviṣayakayathārthajñānenaiva vākyarūpaḥ śabdo jāyata iti lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ/ tadāha - vākyaprayoga iti/ sphuṭametat
GSP29antsdi_u:5112: padasamūhaḥ/ śaktaṃ padam/ asmāt padāt ayamartho boddhavya iti īśvarasaṅgetaḥ śaktiḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5115: śaktinirūpaṇam arthasmṛtyanukūlapadapadārthasambandhaḥ śaktiḥ/ sā ca padārthāntaramiti mīmāṃsakāḥ/ tannirāsārthamāha - asmāditi/
GSP29antsdi_u:5116: ḍitthādīnāmiva ghaṭādīnāmapi saṅketa eva śaktiḥ, na tu padārthāntaramityarthaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5122: śābdabodhajanakasmṛtijanakatvābhāvāt/ arthasmṛtyanukūlatvasya adṛṣṭādisādhāraṇyāt viśeṣyamiti dhyeyam/ padārthāntaramiti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5123: tattatpadārthatāvacchedakābhāvakūṭavadityarthaḥ/ tenātiriktapadārthatvasya anyamatāprasiddhatve 'pi na vyāghātaḥ/ asmāt padāt ayamartho boddhavya iti mūlasya 'etatpadajanyabodhaviṣayo 'yamarthaḥ'
GSP29antsdi_u:5125: na tu padārthāntaramiti/ na ceśvarīyajñānasyecchāyāḥ kṛtervā
GSP29antsdi_u:5127: ādhunikasaṅketasya icchārūpatayā śakterapi icchārūpatve saṅketajñānasya anugatakāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sambhavati nānyathā ityevaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5130: ghaṭapadaboddhavyatvaprakārakatadicchāyāḥ paṭe 'pi sattvāt ghaṭapadavācyatvasya atiprasaṅgaḥ/ evaṃ gaṅgāpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakecchāyāḥ tīre 'pi sattvena śaktyaiva tadbodhasambhave lakṣaṇocchedāpattiriti - vācyam/ yataḥ tattatpadavācyatvaṃ tattatpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakāratānirūpiteśvarecchīyaviśeṣyatāvattvam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5131: tādṛśaprakāratānirūpitaviśeṣyatāsambandhena tadicchāvattvaṃ vā/ tathā ca tādṛśasya ghaṭapadavācyatvasya paṭe 'sattvāt nātiprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5133: svātantryeṇa bhānamīśvarecchāyāṃ upeyate/ itthaṃ ca viśakalitabhānasthale nirūpyanirūpakabhāvāpannaviṣayatāyā
GSP29antsdi_u:5134: gaṅgāpadajanyatvaprakāratānirūpitabodhaviṣayatvaprakāratānirūpitav iśeṣyatāsambandhena icchāvattvasya tīre 'sattvena na kṣatiriti saṅkṣepaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5137: śābdabodhaḥ/ tasya janakaṃ padārthānāṃ smaraṇam, tadanukūlaḥ padapadārthasambandhaḥ śaktiḥ/ tadanukūlatvaṃ ca tajjanakajñānaviṣayatvam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5138: tathā ca yasya padapadārthayoḥ sambandhajñānamasti tasyaiva vākyaghaṭakapadajñānāt tattatpadārthasmaraṇaṃ bhavati/ padajñānaṃ hi ekasambandhijñānamaparasambandhismārakamiti rītyā padārthasmṛtiṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5139: janayati/ yathā pūrvaṃ sambaddhatayā dṛṣṭayoḥ hastihastapakayordhadhye paścāt kadācit ekasya hastipakarūpasambandhino darśanena aparasya
GSP29antsdi_u:5140: hastirūpasya sambandhinaḥ smaraṇaṃ bhavati tadvat pūrvaṃ padapadārthayoḥ sambandhaṃ yaḥ jānāti sa eva ekasya padarūpasya sambandhinaḥ jñāne sati aparamartharūpaṃ sambandhinaṃ smartuṃ śaknoti/ tathā ca sambandhajñānasahakṛtāt padajñānāt padārthasmṛtiḥ tataḥ śābdabodha
GSP29antsdi_u:5144: 'athasmṛtyanukūlapadapadārthasambandhaḥ śaktiḥ' iti dīpikāvākye anukūlaśabdasya yadi kāraṇamityarthaḥ tadā padapadārthasambandhajñānasyārthasmṛtijanakatve 'pi
GSP29antsdi_u:5148: padapadārthasambandhajñānamityasya viṣayitāsambandheta sambandhaviśiṣṭajñānaṃ ityarthaḥ/ tathā ca arthasmṛtikāraṇam
GSP29antsdi_u:5150: padapadārthasambandhasya kāraṇatāvacchedakatvamakṣatam/ kāraṇe vidyamānasyaiva kāraṇatāvacchedakatvāt/ tathā ca padapadārthasambandhasya
GSP29antsdi_u:5151: arthasmṛtiprayojakatvāt tadanukūlatvaṃ sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ/ tathā ca śābdabodhajanakārthasmṛtiprayojakatve sati padapadārthasambandhatvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5152: śakterlakṣaṇamiti paryavasannam/ tatra viśeṣyānupādāne adṛṣṭādiṣvativyāptiḥ/ teṣāṃ kāryasāmānyaṃ prati kāraṇatayā arthasmṛtiṃ pratyapi kāraṇatvāt/ tadvāraṇāya viśeṣyopādānam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5154: viśeṣaṇānupādāne ghaṭapadasya kambugrīvādimadrūpatadarthasya ca yaḥ kālikādisambandhaḥ tatrātivyāptiḥ/ tadvāraṇāya viśeṣaṇam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5156: tasyāḥ smṛteḥ śābdabodhajanakatvaṃ nāsti/ ataḥ śābdabodhajanakārthasmṛtyanukūlatvasya kālikasambandhe
GSP29antsdi_u:5160: iti dīpikātaḥ śaktiḥ kḷptasaptapadārthātiriktaḥ padārthaḥ ityartho
GSP29antsdi_u:5162: aprasiddhatvāt/ tathā ca mīmāṃsakena naiyāyikaṃ prati tatsādhane
GSP29antsdi_u:5163: naiyāyikenāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ udbhāvyatetyālocya vyācaṣṭe-tattatpadārthatāvacchedakābhāvakūṭavadityartha iti/ pratyekaṃ dravyādau prasiddhāḥ ye dravyatvādīnāmabhāvāḥ tadghaṭita samudāyavatī
GSP29antsdi_u:5166: ityarthaḥ/ na vyāghātaḥ - nānupapattiḥ/ asmāt padādityatra pañcamyāḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:5170: ḍitthādipadādayamartho boddhavya ityākārakādhunikecchārūpasaṅketagrahāt ḍitthādipadāt vyaktiviśeṣabodho bhavatīti svīkāraṇīyam/ 'ghaṭadipadāt ayamartho
GSP29antsdi_u:5171: bodhya' ityākārakeśvarecchārūpasaṅketagrahāt ghaṭādipadāt ghaṭādibodha iti vaktavyam/ saṅketatvaṃ ca tattatpadaboddhavyatvaprakārakādhunikecchā - īśvarecchayoḥsādhāraṇo
GSP29antsdi_u:5173: ubhayasādhāraṇasṅketatvāvacchinnaviṣayakajñānatvena śābdabodhaṃ prati ekavidhameva kāraṇatvam/ tattatpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakasya īśvarajñānasya īśvaraprayatnasya vā śaktitve tu ḍitthādipadasthale icchārūpasaṅketajñānāt śābdabodhaḥ ghaṭādipadasthale tu īśvarajñānarūpā īśvarapratnarūpa vā yā śaktiḥ tajjñānādapi
GSP29antsdi_u:5174: śābdabodha ityevaṃ aneke kāryakāraṇabhāvāḥ kalpanīyā iti
GSP29antsdi_u:5175: gauravam/ ataḥ īśvarecchaiva śaktirityarthaḥ/ vinigamakaṃ vinigamanā iti padayoḥ anyatarapakṣasādhakayuktirityarthaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5178: sā cet śaktiḥ tarhi paṭāderapi 'ghaṭādipadavācyatvaṃ prasajyeta/ tathā hi - viśeṣyatāsambandhena ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakabhagavadicchāvatvaṃ ghaṭapadaśakyatvamiti
GSP29antsdi_u:5179: vaktavyam/ 'ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayo ghaṭo bhavatu' ityākārikāyāṃ bhagavadicchāyāṃ ghaṭo viśeṣyaḥ ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaṃ prakāraḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5180: ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakeśvarecchāyāḥ svanirūpitaviśeṣyatāsambandhena ghaṭe sattvāt ghaṭasya ghaṭapadaśakyatvam/ īśvarecchāyāśca ekatvāt tasyāḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:5182: kuḍyaṃ bhavatu' ityādyākārakatvamapyaṅgīkaraṇīyam/ tathā ceśvarecchāyāṃ paṭāderapi viśeṣyatvāt ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakeśvarecchāyāḥ viśeṣyatāsambandhena
GSP29antsdi_u:5185: 'tīrapadajanyabodhaviṣayaḥ tīraṃ bhavatu' ityākārakatāyā apīśvarecchāyāḥ vaktavyatayā tatra gaṅgāpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaṃ prakāraḥtīraṃ viśeṣyamiti gaṅgāpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaprakārakeśvarecchāyāḥ viśeṣyatāsambandhena tīre 'pi sattvāt tīrasyāpi gaṅgāpadavācyatvāt
GSP29antsdi_u:5186: śaktyaiva gaṅgāpadāt tīrasya bodhasambhavena tīre gaṅgāpadasya lakṣaṇā anāvaśyikīti lakṣaṇāyāḥ bhaṅgaśca prasajyeteti śaṅkāyāḥ āśayaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5190: yena pūrvoktadoṣau syātām/ api tu tatpadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitā yā īśvarecchānirūpitā viśeṣyatā tadvattvam
GSP29antsdi_u:5192: tatpadavācyatvam/ īśvarecchāyā ekatvena tasyāṃ sarvasya viśeṣyatve prakāratve 'pi ca īśvarecchīyā tattatpadārthaniṣṭhā viśeṣyatā prakārabhedena bhinnabhinnā bhavati/ evaṃ ca 'ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayo
GSP29antsdi_u:5195: ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitā, na paṭaniṣṭhā viśeṣyatā, paṭāṃśe ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvasyeśvarecchāyā anavagāhanāt/ ataḥ ghaṭapadajanyabodhaviṣayatvaniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitaviśeṣyatāsambandhena īśvarecchāyāḥ ghaṭe eva sattvāt ghaṭasyaiva ghaṭapadavācyatvaṃ na
GSP29antsdi_u:5203: pūrvapradarśitaviśakalitabhānātmikāyāmīśvarecchāyāṃ bodhaniṣṭhaprakāratāyāṃ gaṅgāpadajanyatvāniṣṭhaprakāratānirūpitatvaṃnāstīti uktasambandheneśvarecchāvattvasya tīre 'bhāvāt gaṅgāpadavācyatvaṃ tīrasya nāstīti tīre gaṅgāpadalakṣaṇāyāḥ svīkāryatayā/ na lakṣaṇocchedāpattiśceti bhāvaḥ/ tadṛśasya ghaṭapadavācyatvasyeti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5206: nanu śaktyā yatra padārthabodho bhavati tatraiveśvarecchāyāṃ āvaśyakatā/ lakṣaṇatā yatra bodhaḥ, tatra neśvarecchāyā āvaśyakatvam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5210: vācyārthaṃpravāhasambandhamātreṇa tīrasya gaṅgāpadalakṣyatvopapatterityata āha - saṅkṣepa iti/ kāryasāmānyaṃ prati īśvarecchāyāḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:5211: kāraṇatvāt gaṅgāpadāt tīraviṣayakabodhaṃ pratyapi īśvarecchā kāraṇamiti vaktavyam/ tatra kimākārā īśvarecchā kāraṇamiti jijñāsāyāṃ tīrādau gaṅgāpadavācyatvavyavahārābhāvāt uktaviśakalitabhānavatī īśvarecchaiva kāraṇamityavaśyavaktavyatvāt iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5212: dīpikā viśiṣṭaśaktisthāpanam nanu gavādipadānāṃ jātāveva śaktiḥ, viśeṣaṇatayā jāteḥ prathamamupasthitatvāt/ vyaktilābhastu ākṣepāditi kecit/ tanna -
GSP29antsdi_u:5215: pramāśikā viśiṣṭe śaktiṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ mīmāṃsakamataṃ upanyasya dūṣayatigavādīti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5216: viśeṣaṇībhūtajātigrahamantarā viśiṣṭagrahāsambhavena viśiṣṭe śaktikalpanaṃ na sambhavati/ ataḥ jātigrahasya prathamamapekṣitatvena
GSP29antsdi_u:5217: jātāveva śaktikalpanaṃ ucitam lāghavāt ityāha - viśeṣaṇatayeti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5219: kathaṃ tarhi vyaktilābha ityata āha - vyaktīti/ ākṣepāditi/
GSP29antsdi_u:5221: anupapattipratisandhānaśūnyatādaśāyāmapi vyaktibhānasya anubhavasiddhatvena cetyapi bodhyam/ viśiṣṭavyaktāveveti/ evakāreṇa
GSP29antsdi_u:5227: lakṣyatāvacchedakatvagrahamātreṇa lakṣyatāvacchedakasya yathā śābdabodhe bhānaṃ tathā śakyatāvacchedakatvagrahamātreṇa śakyatāvacchedakasyāpi śābdabodhe bhānaṃ sambhavatīti śakyatāvacchedake ca śaktiḥ na kalpanīyeti vadanti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5230: viśiṣṭaviṣayakabuddhau viśeṣaṇaviṣayakajñānasya kāraṇatvena gotvaviśiṣṭavyaktijñānāt pūrvaṃ gotvarūpaviśeṣaṇajñānaṃ āvaśyakam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5231: tathā ca prathamopasthitatvāt lāghavācca jātāveva śaktikalpanamucitam, na tu tadviśiṣṭavyaktāviti bhāvaḥ/ jātāveveti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5232: evakāreṇa vyaktiṣu śaktivyavacchedaḥ/ lāghavāditi/ vyaktīnāmānantyāt jāteścaikatvāditi bhāvaḥ/ nanu jātau śaktisvīkāre gavādipadāt gotvādijātereva bodhaḥ syāt na tu vyakteḥ/ gopadaśakyatvāt/
GSP29antsdi_u:5233: gopadāśakyasyāpi gopadāt bodhāṅgīkāre gopadāt ghaṭāderapi bodhaḥ syādityaśayena śaṅkate - kathaṃ tarhīti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5234: arthāpattipramāṇādityartha iti/ jātiviṣayakajñānasya vyaktiviṣayakatāniyamāt vyaktibhānaṃ vinā jātibhānamanupapannamityanupapattipratisandhānarūpārthāpattipramāṇajanyavyaktyupasthityā gopadajanyaśābdabodhe vyakterbhānamiti bhāvaḥ/ idamupalakṣaṇam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5235: gopadasya govyaktau śaktyabhāve 'pi lakṣaṇā aṅgīkriyate/ ato lakṣaṇayā śābdabodhe vyaktibhānamityapi draṣṭavyam/ etena govyaktivācakapadābhāve 'pi arthāpattipramāṇopasthitagovyakteḥ śābdabodhe bhānāṅgīkāre padādanupasthitasya pratyakṣādinopasthitasyāpi ghaṭādeḥ śābdabodhe
GSP29antsdi_u:5238: anvayānupapattipratisandhānaśūnyakāle 'pi vyaktibhānasyānubhavasiddhatayā na lakṣaṇayā vyaktibhānamityarthaḥ/ kevalajātikalpanavyaccheda iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5240: nanu jātiviśiṣṭavyakttau śaktikalpane jātau, jātivyaktyoḥ yaḥ samavāyarūpaḥ sambandhaḥ tatra ca śaktyabhāvāt kathaṃ gopadajanyabodhe gotvajāteḥ gotvasamavāyasya ca bhānopapattiḥ/ śakyatāvacchedakatvāt kathañcit gotvabhānopapattāvapi
GSP29antsdi_u:5241: śakyatānavacchedakasya samavāyasya kathaṃ bhānam/ na cākāṅkṣayā bhānamiti vācyam/ dvābhyāṃ padābhyāṃ upasthitayorarthayoḥ yaḥ sambandhaḥ tasya dvābhyāṃ śaktibhyāṃ upasthitayorarthayoryaḥ sambandhaḥ tasya vā samabhivyāhārarūpākāṅkṣābhāsyatvāt padārthatadavacchedakayoḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:5243: bodhyamityādinā/ tathā ca ghaṭatva-samavāya-ghaṭeṣu triṣu ghaṭapadasyaikā śaktiḥ, tathā ca śakyatvāt trayāṇāmapi ghaṭapadajanyabodhe bhānaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5245: padadvayopasthapyārthadvayasambandho vā bhinnābhyāṃ vṛttibhyāmekapadopasthāpyārthadvayasambandho vā padārthadvayasambandha ityanena vivakṣitaḥ/ evakāreṇa śakya-śakyatāvacchedakayoḥ sambandho
GSP29antsdi_u:5247: āvakāṅkṣābhāsyatvenetyarthaḥ/ anyasyāśakyasyeti/ akāṅkṣayā alabhyasya saṃsargasya śakyatvarahitasya
GSP29antsdi_u:5249: navyāstviti/ yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau tīre gaṅgāpadasya lakṣaṇāsvīkāre 'pi
GSP29antsdi_u:5251: lakṣyatāvacchedakamityākārakalakṣyatāvacchedakatvaprakārakajñānamātreṇa alakṣyasyāpi tīratvasya śābdabodhe bhānam, tathā ghaṭatve śaktivirahe 'pi ghaṭatvaṃ śakyatāvacchedakamityākārakaśakyatāvacchedakatvaprakārakajñānamātreṇa ghaṭapadāt ghaṭatvasya bhānaṃ sambhavatīti śakyatāvacchedake ghaṭādau
GSP29antsdi_u:5254: śakyatāvacchedake śaktyasvīkāre pṛthivīpadāt kadācit aṣṭadravyātiriktadravyatvena kadācidgandhavattvena kadācitpṛthivītvena ca śābdabodhāpattiḥ/ pṛthivī pṛthivīpadaśakyā itivat
GSP29antsdi_u:5255: aṣṭadravyātiriktadravyaṃ gandhavān vā pṛthivīpadaśakyamityākārasya śaktigrahasya sambhavāt/ tīratvāvacchinne gaṅgāpadaśakyasambandharūpalakṣaṇājñānāt tīratvena tīrabodhaḥ,
GSP29antsdi_u:5256: gaṅgātīratvāvacchinne gaṅgāpadalakṣaṇājñānāt gaṅgātīratvena tīrabodha itivat/ tathā ca lakṣaṇayā
GSP29antsdi_u:5257: yatkiñcidekadharmāvacchinnaviṣayaka eva śābdabodha iti yathā na niyamaḥ tathā śakyārthabodhe 'pi niyamo na syāt/ śakyatāvacchedake śaktisvīkāre tu pṛthivīpadāt pṛthivītvenaiva śābdabodha iti niyama upapadyate/
GSP29antsdi_u:5261: tādṛśaśābdabodhahetuḥ/ śakyatāvacchedakaśca sarvatra śakyatvānyūnānatiprasaktaḥ laghureva dharmaḥ, sambhavati laghudharmasyāvacchedakatve gurudharmasya
GSP29antsdi_u:5263: śakyatāvacchedakatvam/ atastatra śakyatāvacchedakatvajñānaṃ pramātmakaṃ na sambhavatīti na tasya pramātmakaśābdabodhahetutvam/ lakṣaṇāsthale tu 'tīraṃ pravāhasambandhavat' ityākārakasyeva 'gaṅgātīraṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5264: pravāhasambandhavat' ityākārakasyāpi lakṣaṇājñānasyānubhavasiddhatayā gurāvapi svarūpasambandharūpalakṣyatāvacchedakatvajñānaṃ śābdabodhaheturupeyate/ tathā ca śaktisthale pṛthivītvenaiva śaktyā pṛthivīpadāt pṛthivībodhaḥ, na tu aṣṭadravyātiriktadravyatvādineti
GSP29antsdi_u:5265: niyamaḥ, lakṣaṇāsthale kadācit tīratvena kadācit gaṅgātīratvena bodha ityaniyamaścopapadyata iti lakṣyatāvacchedake yathā na lakṣaṇā tathā śakyatāvacchedake 'pi na śaktiriti navīnānāmāśayaḥ/ tadetatsarvaṃ lakṣyatāvacchedakatvagrahamātreṇa śakyatāvacchedakatvagrahamātreṇa iti padābhyāṃ sūcitamiti dhyeyam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5268: vṛddhavyavahāreṇa/ vyutpitsurbālaḥ 'gāmānaya' iti uttamavṛddhavākyaśravaṇānantaraṃ madhyamavṛddhasya pravṛttimupalabhya gavānayanaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā madhyamavṛddhapravṛttijanakajñānasya anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vākyajanyatvaṃ niścitya 'aśvamānaya, gāṃ badhāna' iti vākyāntare āvāpodvāpābhyāṃ gopadasya gotvaviśiṣṭe śaktiḥ, aśvapadasya aśvatvaviśiṣṭe śaktiriti vyutpadyate/
GSP29antsdi_u:5269: prakāśikā śaktigrahaśca vṛddhavyavahāreṇeti/ śaktigrahastu vṛddhavyavahārādinā sambhavatītyarthaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5275: saṅgacchate/ vyākaraṇāt prakṛtipratyayādīnāṃ śaktigrahaḥ/ upamānāt śaktigrahastu adhastāddarśitaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5276: 'apyekadantaherambalambodaragajānanāḥ' iti kośādekadantādiśabdāḥ gaṇeśatvaviśiṣṭe śaktā ityarthakāt gaṇeśatvaviśiṣṭe śaktigrahaḥ/ tatraikadantādiśabdānāmeva padārthatayā teṣāṃ vibhinnatvena dvandvopapattiḥ/ 'kokilaḥ pikaśabdavācyaḥ'
GSP29antsdi_u:5278: vyavahārataḥ śaktigrahaṃ upapādayati - vyutpitsuriti/ śaktigrahecchāvānityarthaḥ/ uttamavṛdveti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5281: upalabhyetyasyānumāyetyarthaḥ/ 'iyaṃ kriyā prayatnapūrvikā vilakṣaṇakriyātvāt svīyakriyāvat' ityanumānaprayogo bodhyaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5284: samabhivyāhāralabhyatvāt/ 'ananyalabhyo hi śabdārtha' iti nyāyādityabhisandhimāha - aśvamānayetyādi/
GSP29antsdi_u:5285: āvāpaḥ - saṅgrahaḥ/ udvāpaḥ - tyāgaḥ/ vyutpadyata iti/ vyutpattyāśrayo
GSP29antsdi_u:5289: dīrghaśūkaviśiṣṭasya vācakaḥ, mlecchavyavahārāt priyaṅgorvācako veti saṃndehe -
GSP29antsdi_u:5292: iti vākyaśeṣāt dīrghaśūkaviśiṣṭe śaktinirṇayaḥ/ priyaṅgau tu śaktibhramāt prayogaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5294: 'payati pākaṃ karoti' ityatra yatnārthakakarotinā sarvākhyātavyākhyānāt ākhyātasya
GSP29antsdi_u:5299: vṛddhavyavahāreṇeti/ vaddhayoḥ jñānavatoḥ vyavahāraḥ pravṛttiḥ śabdaprayogaśca vṛddhavyavahāraḥ/ prakṛtipratyapādīnāmiti/ 'bhū
GSP29antsdi_u:5301: sattādirūpārthe śaktigrahaḥ/ 'laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve cākarmakebhyaḥ'
GSP29antsdi_u:5304: ityādikośe ekadantaherambādiśabdānāṃ paryāyatvena ekārthavācakatayā kathaṃ dvandvasamāsaḥ/ padārthabheda eva dvandvasamāsāṅgīkārādityatrāha - tatraikadantādīti/ ete śabdāḥ etādṛśārthabodhakā iti jñāpanārthaṃ hi kośaḥ/ tatraikadantādayaḥ śabdāḥ tattadānupūrvīkaśabdarthakā eveti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5305: dīpikāyām vyutpitsurbāla ityādi/ kaścit bālakaḥ gavādipadānāṃ kasminnarthe śaktiriti jijñāsate/ sa kadācit kenacit prerakeṇa ācāryādināṃ śiṣyaṃ prati uktaṃ 'gāmānaya' iti vākyaṃ śṛṇvataḥ śiṣyasya gavānayanaṃ paśyati/ tataḥ gavānayanarūpakriyāṃ prati kāraṇabhūtaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5307: tatkriyāviṣayakajñānasya kāraṇatvāt tādṛśajñānaṃ prati prayojakavṛddhaprayuktaṃ vākyameva
GSP29antsdi_u:5309: 'gāmānaya' iti vākyajanyamiti niścinoti/ tatra gopadasya gotvaviśiṣṭe śaktiṃ vinā gopadārthasya karmatve 'nvayāsambhavāt
GSP29antsdi_u:5310: gopadasya gotvaviśiṣṭe śaktirityapi niścinoti ityanayā rītyā vyavahārasya śaktigrāhakatvamiti bhāvaḥ/ pravṛttiśabdaḥ prayatnaparaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5311: nanu pravṛttijanakasya gavānayanaviṣayakajñānasya vākyajanyatvāt vākyasyaiva gokarmakānayane śaktiḥ kalpyatāmityatrāha - prakāśikāyām vākyasyeti/ viśiṣṭer'the
GSP29antsdi_u:5312: iti/ gokarmakatvaviśiṣṭānayanarūpe vākyārthe ityarthaḥ/ tathā ca padaśaktyā upasthitānāmarthānāṃ anvayarūpasya vākyārthasya samabhivyāhārarūpākāṅkṣayaiva bhānopapattyā vākyārthe na śaktiriti
GSP29antsdi_u:5313: bhāvaḥ/ api ca gopadasyānayanānvitagavi śaktisvīkāre 'gāṃ badhāna'
GSP29antsdi_u:5314: ityatrāpi tādṛśagobodhopapattiḥ/ evamānayapadasya gokarmakānayane śaktisvīkāre 'aśvamānaya' ityatrāpi tadbodhāpattiḥ/ ataḥ gopadasya gotvaviśiṣṭe ānayapadasya ānayanatvaviśiṣṭe ca śaktirniścīyate/
GSP29antsdi_u:5323: nanu sarvatra kāryaparatvāt vyavahārasya kāryaparavākya eva vyutpattiḥ na siddhapara iti cet - na/ 'kāśyāṃ tribhuvanatilako bhūpatirāste' ityādau siddhe 'pi vyavahārāt 'vikasitapadme madhukaraḥ tiṣṭhati' ityādau prasiddhapadasamabhivyāhārāt siddhe 'pi madhukarādivyutpattidarśanāt
GSP29antsdi_u:5327: kāryaparatvāditi yojanā/ kāryaparatvaṃ ca kṛtisādhyānayanādirūpakriyātātparyakatvam/ vyutpattiḥ - śaktigrahaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5328: vyavacchedyaṃ sphuṭayati - na siddheti/ siddhe 'pi vyavahārāditi/ tathā ca siddhe 'pi śaktigrahastvāvaśyakaḥ/ anyathā tatrānubhavasiddhasya śabdabodhasya apalāpāpatteriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5329: bālapriyā siddhe 'pi śaktigraha ityatra siddhaśabdaḥ kriyāvyatiriktaparaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5332: śabdavṛttiḥ/ śakyasambandho lakṣaṇā/ gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra
GSP29antsdi_u:5337: jahallakṣaṇā, ajahallakṣaṇā, jahadajahallakṣaṇā ceti/ yatra vācyārthasyānvayābhāvaḥ tatra jahallakṣaṇā/ yathā mañcāḥ krośantīti/ yatra vācyārthasyāpyanvayaḥ tatra ajahaditi/ yathā chatriṇo gacchantīti/ yatra vācyaikadeśatyāgena ekadeśānvayaḥ tatra jahadajahaditi/ yathā tattvamasīti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5338: prakāśikā tīre 'pi śaktirna kalpyata iti/ gaṅgāpadasyeti śeṣaḥ/ nanu evaṃ saindhavādipadānāṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5339: nānārthakatvānupapattiḥ, ekatra śaktiḥ anyatra lakṣaṇetyeva nirvāhādata āha - saindhavādāviti/ ādinā haryādiparigrahaḥ/ sambandhābhāvāditi/
GSP29antsdi_u:5341: idamupalakṣaṇam-prasiddhayorarthayoḥ kutra lakṣaṇetyatra vinigamakābhāvena ubhayatra śaktikalpanasyāvaśyakateti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5342: mañcā iti/ mañcapadaṃ mañcasthapuruṣe lākṣaṇikam/ vācyāryasya
GSP29antsdi_u:5344: lakṣyasamuccayaḥ/ chatriṇa iti/ ekasārthavāhitvena chatryacchatriṣu gamanakartṛtvānvayaḥ/ tātparyānupapattireva lakṣaṇābījam/ na ca chatrītyasya matubarthakenipratyayāntasya padasamūharūpatvena
GSP29antsdi_u:5345: tacchakyāprasiddhyā tatsambandharūpalakṣaṇāyā abhāvena kathamidamudāharaṇamiti vācyam/ 'pratipādyasambandha eva lakṣaṇā'
GSP29antsdi_u:5348: kecittu - chatrapadasya ekasārthe lakṣaṇā/ taddhitārthaḥ sambandhī/ tathā caikasārthaṃsambandhino gacchantītyanvayabodhaḥ ityāhuḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5351: viśeṣaṇāṃśaparityāgaḥ/ tathā ca tatpadalakṣyasya śuddhasya tvaṃpadalakṣyeṇa saha abhedānvayopapattirityabhiprāyaḥ/ idamudāharaṇaṃ tu jīvabrahmaṇoraikyaṃ bruvatāṃ brahmavādināṃ matābhiprāyeṇa/ naiyāyikamate
GSP29antsdi_u:5353: ityādau tattāṃśasya idānīmasambhavāddhānam, idantvāṃśasya sambhavādahānamiti jahadajahallakṣaṇāmācakṣate/
GSP29antsdi_u:5355: nityaḥ' ityādau ghaṭatvasyeva 'so 'yam devadatta' ityādau tattāṃśasyopalakṣaṇatayā bhāne na kiñcit bādhakamiti kiṃ jahadajahallakṣaṇayeti vadanti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5357: saṃyogādirūpasambandhābhāvāditi/ tathā ca śakyasambandharūpalakṣaṇāyā asambhavāt lavaṇāśvayorūbhayoreva
GSP29antsdi_u:5360: mañcasthaśiśāviti yuktam, rodanādirūpakrośanakartṛtvasya tatraiva svārasikatvādityāhuḥ/ vācyārthasyeti/ mañcapadaśakyārthasya mañcasya samabhivyāhṛtakrośatipadārthakrośanakartṛtvānvayavirahāt anvayānupapattirūpalakṣaṇābījasattvāt - mañcapadasya mañcasthe puruṣe
GSP29antsdi_u:5362: vācyārthaviśeṣyaketarapadārthānvayaviṣayakaśābdabodhajanakatvaṃ na sambhavati tatra pade jahallakṣaṇā, yā lakṣaṇā vācyārthaṃ tyajati sā jahallakṣaṇā, jahatī ca sā lakṣaṇā ceti karmadhārayāt/ athavā śakyārthaṃ jahataḥ tyajataḥ padasya lakṣaṇā jahallakṣaṇeti ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣaḥ/ yatra śakyārtho na parityajyate śakyārthāparityāgena lakṣyārthabodhaḥ tatra
GSP29antsdi_u:5363: ajahallakṣaṇā/ 'yathā chatriṇo gacchanti' iti/ atra chatripadasya chatryacchatrighaṭitasamudāye lakṣaṇā/ ekasārthavāhitveneti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5365: chatryacchatriṣvanvayaḥ/ chatripadalakṣyeṣu ekasamudāyaghaṭakatvaviśiṣṭeṣu chatryacchatriṣu gamanakartṛtvānvaya iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5366: nanvanvayānupapattirna lakṣaṇāyā bījam/ 'yaṣṭīḥ praveśaya' ityādau yaṣṭipadavācyānāṃ yaṣṭīnāmapi praveśanakarmatvānvayasambhavenānvayānupapattirūpabījābhāvāt yaṣṭipadasya yaṣṭidhare lakṣaṇāyā ayogādityata āha -
GSP29antsdi_u:5371: nanu tārkikamate śaktaṃ padamiti padalakṣaṇāt chatrin iti vākyameva/ chatrapadasya chatre śaktatvāt inipratyayasya sambandhe śaktatvāt prakṛtipratyayarūpapadadvayasamūharūpatvāt chatripadasya/ vākye ca śaktyabhāvāt vākyaśakyārthāprasiddhyā śakyasambandharūpā lakṣaṇā na sambhavati/ tathā ca chatrinnityasya ajahallakṣaṇodāharaṇatvaṃ na sambhavatīti
GSP29antsdi_u:5374: ityarthaḥ/ tathā ca chatrinniti vākyaśakyārthāprasiddhāvapi tādṛśavākyajanyabodhaviṣayo
GSP29antsdi_u:5375: yor'thaḥ chatravāniti tatsambandhasya samudāye sattvāt vākye 'pi
GSP29antsdi_u:5376: lakṣaṇopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ/ anyatheti/ śakyasambandha eva lakṣaṇeti
GSP29antsdi_u:5377: svīkāra ityarthaḥ/ kākataditareti/ kākataditarabiḍālādisādhāraṇaṃ yat dadhināśakatvaṃ tadavacchinne kākapadasya lakṣaṇetyarthaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5379: padalakṣaṇayaiva nirvāhaṃ vadatāṃ matamāha - kecittviti/ ekasārtha iti/ ekasamudāyatva
GSP29antsdi_u:5381: gacchantītyarthaḥ/ samudāyatvaṃ cāpekṣābuddhiviśeṣaviṣayatvam/ atha vā chatrapadasya ekasamudāyor'thaḥ, ini pratyayasya ghaṭakatvarūpasambandhaviśiṣṭor'thaḥ/ āhuḥ ityasvarasodbhāvanam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5382: tadbījaṃ tu chatrapadasya chatrighaṭitasamudāyatvārthakatve chatrapadajanyaśābdabodhe chatrapadamukhyārthasśya chatrasya mukhyaviśeṣyatayā bhānābhāvāt atratyalakṣaṇāyā ajahatsvārthatvānupapattiriti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5383: atra tatpadavācya ityādi/ tattvamasītyatra tatpadasya sarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭacaitanyaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5385: samānavibhakterabhedor'thaḥ/ sa ca viśiṣṭayorbādhitaḥ/ ataḥ vācyārthaikadeśayoḥ sarvajñatva-antaḥkaraṇarūpaviśeṣaṇayoḥ tyāgena caitanyamātraṃ dvābhyāṃ padābhyāṃ lakṣyate/ so 'yaṃ devadatta
GSP29antsdi_u:5387: idaṃpadasya etaddeśaitatkālaviśiṣṭor'thaṃḥ/ viśiṣṭayoraikyaṃ ca bādhitam/ ataḥ tatpadaśakyārthaviśiṣṭaikadeśasya tattaddeśatattatkālavṛttitvarūpaviśeṣaṇasya tyāgena viśeṣye devadatte tatpadasya lakṣaṇā/ evaṃ ca yatra viśeṣaṇasya śakyaikadeśasya tyāgena
GSP29antsdi_u:5389: pare tviti/ yathā ghaṭo 'nitya ityatra ghaṭatvaviśiṣṭe anityatvaviśiṣṭābhedo na
GSP29antsdi_u:5392: devadatta ityādāvapi tattopalakṣite idantvānvayenopapattyā jahadajahallakṣaṇā māstviti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5393: dīpikā gauṇīvyañjanayorvṛtyantaratvakhaṇḍanam gauṇyapi lakṣaṇaiva lakṣyamāṇaguṇasambandhasvarūpā/ yathā agnirmāṇavaka iti/ vyañjanāpi
GSP29antsdi_u:5396: prakāśikā gauṇyā vṛttyantaratvaṃ nirācaṣṭe - gauṇyapīti/ nanu 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa'
GSP29antsdi_u:5397: ityatra tīre śakyasya pravāhasyeva 'agnirmāṇavaka' ityādau māṇavake śakyasya agneḥ sākṣātsambandho na saṃbhavati iti kathaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5398: lakṣaṇayā nirvāha ityata āha - lakṣyamāṇeti/ lakṣyamāṇo yo guṇaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:5399: śucitvādiḥ tatsambandharūpāṃ ityarthaḥ/ ayamabhiprāyaḥ - śakyasambandho hi lakṣaṇā/ sa ca kvacitsākṣātsambandhaḥ, kvacitparamparāsambandhaḥ/ evaṃ ca śakyasyāgneḥ svaniṣṭhaśucitvavattvasambandha eva lakṣaṇeti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5400: ālaṅkārikāḥ punarevamāhuḥ - 'tīre ghoṣa' iti śabdaprayoge svāyatte
GSP29antsdi_u:5402: śaityapāvanatvādipratītyartham/ na ca sā pratītirlakṣaṇayā upapadyate kevalatīralakṣaṇayaiva anvayānupapattiparihāre śaityapāvanatvādiviśiṣṭalakṣaṇāyāṃ mānābhāvāt/ tasmāt
GSP29antsdi_u:5406: ramyāḥ' ityādau bhūdharaśabdena parvatānāmiva rājñāmapi śaktyaiva pratītiḥ sambhavati/ 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa' ityādau tu śaityapāvanatvādiviśiṣṭatīrapratītirapi lakṣaṇāsāmrājyādeva/ tatra lakṣaṇākalpikāyāḥ tātparyānupapattereva sadbhāvāt kiṃ vyañjanayeti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5407: nanu śabdaśaktimūlāyā vyañjanāyā anyathāsiddhatve 'pi arthaśaktimūlāyāstasyā nānyathāsiddhiḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5409: “gaccha gacchasi cetkānta panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5410: mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyāt yatra gato bhavān//”
GSP29antsdi_u:5411: ityādau 'he priya tava gamanottaraṃ mama prāṇanāśo bhaviṣyati/ ato na gantavyam'
GSP29antsdi_u:5412: ityādyartho vyajyate/ na hyatra śaktilakṣaṇābhyāṃ nirvāhaḥ/ itthaṃ ca vyañjanāyā āvaśyakatetyata āha - arthaśaktimūlā ceti/ castvarthaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5418: pratyemi' ityanubhavaḥ tadā vaiyañjanikī pratītiḥ gīrvāṇaguruṇāpyaśakyavāraṇeti vyañjanāsiddhi
GSP29antsdi_u:5420: bālapriyā lakṣyamāṇo yo guṇa ityādi/ lakṣyamāṇaḥ śakyārthavṛttiryo guṇaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:5421: tatsajātīyaguṇavattvaṃ gauṇīvṛttirityarthaḥ/ agnirmāṇavaka ityatra agnipadaśakyārthavahnivṛttiryo guṇaḥ śucitvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5422: tatsajātīyaśucitvavān māṇavaka iti bodhaḥ/ nanvetādṛśyāḥ gauṇyā vṛtteḥ kathaṃ śakyasambandharūpalakṣaṇāyāmantarbhāva ityatrāha -
GSP29antsdi_u:5423: ayamabhiprāya iti/ śakyārthapratiyogikaḥ sambandho lakṣaṇā/ sambandhaśca
GSP29antsdi_u:5426: agnirmāṇavaka ityatra tu śakyārthasyāgneḥ svavṛttiguṇasajātīyaguṇavattvarūpaḥ paramparāsambandhaḥ māṇavake 'sti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5429: punariti/ yadi 'gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa' ityādau tīravṛttirghoṣa ityākārakabodho vivakṣitaḥ, tarhi tīravācakaṃ śabdameva prayuñjīta tīre ghoṣa iti/ ghoṣānanvitārthavācakaṃ gaṅgāpadaṃ ca prayuñjīta/
GSP29antsdi_u:5431: sa ca 'tīre ghoṣa' ityato na budhyeta/ gaṅgāpadaprayoge tu tatsāmarthyāt gaṅgāpravāhagataśaityapāvanatvādirvyajyata iti vaktuṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5433: lakṣaṇāstu, tathā ca lakṣaṇayaiva śaityapāvanatvādipratītyupapatteḥ vyañjanayā na prayojanamiti vācyam/ anvayānupapattirhi lakṣaṇābījam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5434: sā ca tīralakṣaṇayaiva parihartuṃ śakyeti śaityapāvanatvādilakṣaṇāyāṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5435: pramāṇābhāvāt/ tasmāt vyañjanākhyā atiriktā vṛttiḥ svīkaraṇīyā,
GSP29antsdi_u:5441: dūrasthā eva ramyā ityaprakṛtor'tho 'pyatra pratīyate/ sā ca pratītiḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:5442: bhūdharaśabdaśaktimūlā/ tathā ca nānārthasthale arthaprakaraṇādinā nivāritasyāprakṛtārthasya pratītiḥ yadbalāt bhavati sā
GSP29antsdi_u:5443: śabdaśaktimūlāvyañjanā ityālaṅkārikāḥ/ tatra bhūdharaśabdena parvatānāmiva rājñāmapi śabdaśaktyaiva pratītisambhavāt nāsti vyañjanāyāḥ āvaśyakateti naiyāyikāḥ/ evaṃ gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau gaṅgāpadasya śaityapāvanatvādiviśiṣṭatīre lakṣaṇāṅgīkāreṇaiva śaityādipratītirupapadyate/ yadyapyatrānvayānupapattirnāsti, tathāpi
GSP29antsdi_u:5444: tātparyānupapattirasti, śaityapāvanatvādibodhatātparyeṇaiva tīrapadaṃ parityajya gaṅgāpadaprayogāt tasya tātparyasya lakṣaṇāṃ vinānupapatteḥ/ tātparyānupapattireva lakṣaṇābījam nānvayānupapattiriti pūrvamevoktaṃ vakṣyati ca dīpikāyām/ tathā ca kṛtaṃ vyañjanayeti bhāvaḥ/

GSP29antsdi_u:5631: yogyatā/ padānāmavilambenocchāraṇaṃ sannidhiḥ/ ākāṅkṣādirahitaṃ vākyaṃ na pramāṇam/ yathā gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastī iti vākyaṃ na
GSP29antsdi_u:5632: pramāṇam/ ākāṅkṣāvirahāt/ agninā siñcatīti vākyaṃ na pramāṇam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5633: yogyatāvirahāt/ prahare prahare 'sahoccaritāni gāmānaya ityādipadāni na pramāṇaṃ sānnidhyābhāvāt/
GSP29antsdi_u:5637: syāt/ ākāṅkṣāṃ lakṣayati - padasyeti/ yogyatālakṣaṇamāha - artheti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5638: sannidhilakṣaṇamāha - padānāmiti/ avilambena padārthopasthitiḥ sannidhiḥ/ uccāraṇaṃ tu tadupayogitayoktam/ gauraśva iti/ ghaṭaḥ karmatvamityapi anākāṅkṣodāharaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5639: prakāśikā ākāṅkṣādirahitapadasamudāyāt śābdabodhavāraṇāya ākāṅkṣādeḥ śābdabodhahetutvaṃ abhihitaṃ mūlakṛtā/ tacca navīnamate na sambhavatīti tajjñānasya hetutāmāha -
GSP29antsdi_u:5643: ākāṅkṣetyarthaḥ/ prayuktatvaṃ ca 'kāraṇābhāvātkāryābhāvaḥ' iti pratītisākṣikaḥ svarūpasambandhaviśeṣaḥ/ ajanakatvāntaṃ paricārakam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5645: bādhaniścayābhābo yogyateti navīnamate tu svarūpasatyeva yogyatā taddheturiti dik/
GSP29antsdi_u:5647: ākāṅkṣāyāḥ śābdabodhahetutve yatra ākāṅkṣā nāsti, paraṃ tu ākāṅkṣā astīti bhramo 'sti tatra śābdabodha iṣyamāṇo na syāt/
GSP29antsdi_u:5649: tadviṣayakabhramātmakajñānāt śābdabodha upapadyata iti bhāvaḥ/ evaṃ yogyatāyāḥ śābdabodhahetutve yogyatāvirahe 'pi
GSP29antsdi_u:5650: yogyatābhramācchābdabodho na syāt/ ato yaugayatājñānasya śābdabodhahetutvu vaktavyamiti bhāvaḥ/ yatpadasyeti/ yatpadasya ghaṭapadasya ampadābhāvaprayuktaṃ ghaṭaniṣṭhaṃ karmatvaṃ ityākārakaśābdabodhājanakatvamiti ghaṭapadasya ampadasamabhivyāhṛtatvaṃ ākāṅkṣā/ kāraṇābhāvāt kāryābhāva iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5654: yatpadaṃ na bodhajanakaṃ tatsamabhivyāhṛtatvamiti jñāpanāya ajanakāntamuktam na tu tadapi lakṣaṇaghaṭakam, prayojanābhāvāditi
GSP29antsdi_u:5658: svaṃ payasā siñcatīti vākyam tadghaṭakamekapadaṃ payaseti padaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5659: tatpratipādyor'thaḥ payaḥ karaṇakatvaṃ tadviśiṣṭe 'parapadārthaḥ sekaḥ tatpratipādakatvaṃ payasā siñcatīti vākye 'stīti tādṛśavākyasya
GSP29antsdi_u:5660: yogyatā/ etādṛśayogyatāviṣayakaṃ saṃśayātmakaṃ niścayātmakaṃ vā jñānaṃ śābdabodhahetuḥ/ ekapadārthe aparapadārthavattvābhāvarūpabādhaviṣayakaniścayābhāvo yogyateti
GSP29antsdi_u:5661: navyamate tu bādhiniścayābhāvarūpayogyatā pratibandhakābhāvavidhayā svarūpataḥ satī hetuḥ na tu tādṛśayogyatājñānaṃ kāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5664: bādhaniścayābhāvo yogyateti mate tasya śābdabuddhiṃ prati
GSP29antsdi_u:5666: pratibandhaka iti sāmānyapratibadhyapratibandhakabhāvenaiva nirvāhāt ityata āha - digiti/ tatadvākyaghaṭakatattatpadārthasmaraṇe sati kvacinniścayarūpaṃ kvacitsaṃśayarūpaṃ vā yogyatājñānaṃ sambhavati/
GSP29antsdi_u:5667: bhūtale ghaṭa iti prātyakṣikaniścayottaraṃ jāyamāne śābdabodhe tādṛśaprātyakṣikaniścayātmakaṃ yogyatājñānaṃ kāraṇam/ yatra tu vākyārtho 'pūrvaḥ 'nadyāstīre pañca phalāni santi' itayādau tatra saṃśayātmakaṃ yogyatājñānaṃ kāraṇam/ ataḥprathamapakṣe na doṣaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5670: 'ghaṭaprakārakabhūtalaviśeṣyakacākṣuṣaṃ me jāyatām' iti icchābalāt ghaṭavadbhūtalamiti cākṣuṣajñānotpattyā
GSP29antsdi_u:5671: vyabhicāraprasaṅgāt/ api tu tadviṣayakacākṣuṣecchāvirahaviśiṣṭatadabhāvaniścayatvena viśiṣyaiva pratibadhyapratibandhakabhāvo vaktavyaḥ/ āhāryānumiteranaṅgīkārāt anumitiṃ prati tadabhāvaniścayapratibandhakatāyāṃ icchāviraho na
GSP29antsdi_u:5672: niveśyata iti tatprakārakānumitiṃ prati tadabhāvaniścayapratibandhakatāyāṃ icchāviraho na niveśyata iti tatprakārakānumitiṃ prati tadabhāvaprakārakaniścatvena pṛthageva
GSP29antsdi_u:5673: pratibandhakatā/ evameva śābdabodhe 'pi pṛthageva pratibandhakatvaṃ kalpanīyamiti bādhaniścayābhāvarūpayogyatāyāḥ śābdabodhakāraṇatvamavaśyakalpanīyamiti/ dvitīyapakṣe 'pi na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5683: vaidikaṃ laukikaṃ ceti/ vaidikaṃ īśvaroktatvāt sarvamapi
GSP29antsdi_u:5684: pramāṇam/ laukikaṃ tu āptavākyaṃ pramāṇam/ anyadapramāṇam/
GSP29antsdi_u:5685: vākyārthajñānaṃ śābdajñānam/ tatkaraṇaṃ śabdaḥ/ evaṃ yathārthānubhavo nirūpitaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5689: vedapauruṣeyatvam nanu vedasya anāditvāt kathamīśvaroktatvamiti cet - na/ 'vedaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ vākyasamhatvāt bhāratādivat' ityanumānena pauruṣeyatvasiddheḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5690: na ca smaryamāṇakartṛkatvamupādhiḥ, gautamādibhiḥ śiṣyaparamparayā vede 'pi sakartṛkatvasmaraṇena
GSP29antsdi_u:5692: nanu varṇāḥ nityāḥ, sa evāyaṃ gakāra iti pratyabhijñābalāt/ tathā ca katha vedasya anityatvam iti cet - na/ 'utpanno gakāraḥ, vinaṣṭo gakāraḥ'
GSP29antsdi_u:5693: ityādipratītyā varṇānāmanityatvāt, 'so 'yaṃ gakāraḥ' iti pratyabhijñāyāḥ 'seyaṃ dīpajvālā' itivat sājātyāvalambanatvāt/
GSP29antsdi_u:5694: varṇānāṃ nityatve 'pyānupūrvīviśiṣṭavākyasya atityatvācca/ tasmāt īśvaroktāḥ vedāḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5695: prakāśikā mīmāṃsakaḥ śaṅkate - nanviti/ vedasya īśvaroktatvaṃ anumānena vyavasthāpayati - veda iti/ nanu
GSP29antsdi_u:5696: 'aṣṭādaśapurāṇānāṃ kartā satyavatīsutaḥ' ityādi pramāṇabalena bhāratādau kartā upalabhyate/ na hi tathā vede/ tathā ca smaryamāṇakartṛkatvasya bhāratādau sādhyavyāpakatvena pakṣe sādhanāvyapakatvena ca upādhitvāt kathamidamanumānaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:5697: sādhakaṃ bhevadityāśaṅkate - na ceti/ gautamādibhiḥśiṣyaparamparayā vede kartuṃrūpadeśe vivadantaṃ pratyāha - tasmāditi/
GSP29antsdi_u:5699: atra etatkālikagakāre pūrvakālikagakārābhedo bhāsate/ sa ca varṇānāmanityatve na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ/ anityatvāditi/ tarhi pratyabhijñāvirodha ityata āha - so 'yamiti/
GSP29antsdi_u:5700: utpattivināśapratyayayoranyārthakatvakalpanāpekṣayā tatpratyayasya tathātvakalpane lāghavamiti hadayam/ 'agnimīle' ityādau ānupūrvīṃ - ākārottaragakārottaranatvādirūpā/
GSP29antsdi_u:5702: atityatvānaṅgīkāre 'pyanityakṣaṇaghaṭitāyā ānupūrvyā anityatvāt tadviśiṣṭavākyasamudāyatmakavedasya tvadabhimatamanityatvaṃ na
GSP29antsdi_u:5709: upādhitvāditi/ yatrayatra pauruṣeyatvaṃ bhāratādau tatra smaryamāṇakartṛkatvamastīti smaryamāṇakartṛkatvasya
GSP29antsdi_u:5711: pakṣe vede tatra smaryamāṇakartṛkatvaṃ nāstīti tasya
GSP29antsdi_u:5715: ityupadideśa, so 'pi svaśiṣyāya tathopadideśetyevaṃ śiṣyaparamparayā gautamīyāḥ vedānāṃ sakartṛkatvaṃ smaranti/ tathā ca smaryamāṇakartṛkatvasya pakṣavṛttitayā sādhanāvyāpakatvābhāvāt
GSP29antsdi_u:5716: nopādhitvamiti dīpikoktaṃ na saṅgacchate/ gotamādayaḥ tathopadidiśurityatra pramāṇābhāvāt iti śaṅkāyā arthaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5717: tasmāditīti/ tepānāt tapaḥ kurvata īśvarāt trayo vedā
GSP29antsdi_u:5718: ajāyanteti śrutyarthaḥ/ tathā ca anayā śrutyaiva vedānāmīśvarasṛṣṭatvarūpaṃ pauruṣaiyatvaṃ pramitamiti anumānasya nāpekṣeti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:5719: anityatve na sambhavatīti/ yadi varṇāḥ utpattivināśavantaḥ tarhi pūrvakālikagakārasya naṣṭatvāt etatkālikagakāre tadabhedāvagāhinī pratyabhijñā na saṅgaccheteti bhāvaḥ/ nanu varṇānāmutpattivināśāvagāhipratītibalāt utpattivināśavattve siddhe pūrvottarakālikagakārayorabhedāsambhavāt 'so 'yaṃ gakāraḥ' iti pratyabhijñā nābhedamavagāhate/ api tu tajjātīyatvam/
